78b5(yum): dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa'i
78b6(yum): rang bzhir med pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa
78b7(yum): dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos med pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa zhi bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag par spong pa rnam
78b8(yum): la yang dag slong ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / dbang po'i rnams la dbang po'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
79a1(yum): bzhin med pa dang / stobs rnams la stobs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi

79a5(yum): thar pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i spobs par 'jug pa dgu la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang

81b1(yum): da med do// rang stong ba 'ad la nang sad pa yid kyi mtshan nying med de// phyi snang ba'i dul gyi snang banyid kyi mtshan 'ad med de// phyinang snang

82a3(yum): pa'i mtshan nyid do// yang dag par spong pa rnams la yang dag par spod pa'i mtshan nyid med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la baM rdzu 'phrul/

89b2(yum): pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
89b3(yum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te tshor ba la spyod na mtshar ma la spyod do// gal te 'du shes
89b4(yum): la spyad na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te 'du byed la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
89b5(yum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
89b6(yum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs
89b7(yum): mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
89b8(yum): thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
90a1(yum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che// thams mi mkhas pas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// com ldan 'das
90a2(yum): te gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs bdag ces bgyi bA spyod no/
90a3(yum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyad
90a4(yum): na mtshan la stod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas
90a5(yum): gzugs zhe zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye/
90a6(yum): pa'i thabs memakhas pas/ gzugs ma ni nas bgyi bar spyod mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das pal te/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa
90a7(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'iH/ thabs mi mkhas pas// gzugs dben zhes bgyi ba mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal/
90a8(yum): te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod ma
90b1(yum): rnam la byung // gyu ma palan cang nam sa ma dpa' rnams dpa ldan pags ra ma tu na pa la gyung du 'aM/ da
90b2(yum): pas tshur ba tig ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la snang // bcom ldan 'das pal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tsher ba shes rab kyi rab tu
90b3(yum): stod pa'i tshe/ babs mi mkhas pas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces byar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
90b4(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem
90b5(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshor ba du sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod//
90b6(yum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshor ba bdag ces bgyib
90b7(yum): zung mnamal sa ma rnam sa pal byang chub mams dpa' sems dpa' chen pags rab gyi ram tuphyin pa la byung pa mthabs mi ma sa

91a2(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po

91a7(yum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' semal dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thubs mi mkhas pas 'du shes bde zhes

96b3(yum): zabs mi mkhas pas/ lus rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la byu / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
96b4(yum): zo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshams la spyod / bcom ldan
96b5(yum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus bde zhes bgyi bar
96b6(yum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
96b7(yum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
96b8(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus bdag ces bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan

97a3(yum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sa
97a4(yum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom

104a9(yum): bcom ldan 'das gal te bya
104b1(yum): na na / bsam ma gas ma nas
104b2(yum): na 'ab la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la srung ba'i bas mi mkhas pa
104b3(yum): par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na par
104b4(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes brtse bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldam sa
104b5(yum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ pA'i rnam par
104b6(yum): shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems rgyu dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
104b7(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
104b8(yum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa
105a1(yum): sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
105a2(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
105a3(yum): bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam shes pa men gces bgyi bar spyod na mtsham
105a4(yum): rgal pyod/ bcom ldan 'das das te byang chub semam dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ thabs mi ma khams/ ma
105a5(yum): shes pa 'di mes bgyi bar spyod mas nam la myong / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi tshal tu phyin pa la
105a6(yum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ lho'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
105a7(yum): chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ klu'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'a
105a8(yum): byang chu mams dpa' sems dpa'i chen monapar ragyi rol du phyin pa ma gyud pa ma ma mkhas pal 'i rnam pa nami pa bdag rnaMm gyi
105b1(yum): pa ni mam kyi byung mamananam 'byung/ sa 'an 'am sal te byang ma 'ams dpa' na pa
105b2(yum): tham myong ba'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das lal te byang chub
105b3(yum): dpa' thams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mas
105b4(yum): nga ngo / bcom ldan 'das te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la spong pa'i che/ thabs mi mkhab pas/ lce'i rnamapa
105b5(yum): sa pa med zed nis bgyi bar spyong na mtshan ma la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
105b6(yum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
105b7(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod
106a1(yum): pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/
106a2(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa'o/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
106a3(yum): spyod / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkham pas
106a4(yum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

106b3(yum): shes pa dben nos bgyi bar byung namatshan ma mtshung / bcom ldan 'das pal te rgya chu sems dpa' sems dpa' na thags rab
106b4(yum): tu byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spong na mtshan ma la spyod do/ shes rab kyig

107a2(yum): namatshan maspyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/

107a6(yum): med sa dz+ra ba byong mamatshanam nga bcom ldan 'das la byung chub ma sa dpa' rnams dpa' chan zags rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa

108a8(yum): ba'i che thabs mi mkha' pas/ mi gi 'dus te rig pa dben nas bgyi bar spong na mtshan ma la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chu

112b4(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen za napa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dums rdeg pa dben nus bgyi ba

151a7(yum): do bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she pa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mi dmigs bstong
151a8(yum): nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyad na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
151b1(yum): mad kyimam pa ma ba cad ya ca makyi mamamamam pa da ma nga
151b2(yum): da' rkyen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ram spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pa pa/ med megs pa rung banyid bdam med ces brtsi bar spyod nam tshan ma ma byung nga / bcom
151b3(yum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ zabs mi mkhas 'as/ ming dmigs stong banyid
151b4(yum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i rtsa thabs mi mkhapa
151b5(yum): mi dmigs pastong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

151b7(yum): dpang sem pa pas chen mags rab kyi roladu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma/ 'bas sema'am med migs pa banyid me dberna mas bgyi ba byungs
151b8(yum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi la rol tu phyin la lagyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa sa/ dngapam med/

165b8(yum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
166a1(yum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
166a2(yum): spyod pa'i tshe/ zab sa mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan ma la spyod do//
166a3(yum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i 'grang sa
166a4(yum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
166a5(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i zla stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma ni zhes bgyi bar spong na/
166a6(yum): mtshan ma la spyad do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shepa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byung ba'i tsha thabam mi mkhas pas
166a7(yum): bar thar pa'i song pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
166a8(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin lam byung ba'i/ tha' pa ma mkhas pas/ rnam par bar ba'i stothong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med 'ad/ sngon
166b1(yum): gas kyib tshung na/ mam da / tsham ldan 'das ma byang chul mam sa dpa' sems dpa' chen nas ba kyipar 'a tsham
166b2(yum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i rna myong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ston pa med pa mi dben nas bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das
166b3(yum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bgyi ba
166b4(yum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkha
166b5(yum): bas mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
166b6(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
166b7(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi ba
166b8(yum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myong ba'i tshe/ thabs
167a1(yum): / me mkhas pa pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar pyod na/ mtshan ma la myod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
167a2(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tha bas mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan
167a3(yum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni nem bgyi bar gyur
167a4(yum): namatshan ma la myong / babacom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zab pa mi mkhas pas mtshan
167a5(yum): par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
167a6(yum): la skyong pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
167a7(yum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa ras tu byon 'am byung ba'i rtsi/ zab pa mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi dben nes brtse bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la zung
167a8(yum): batsham ldan ma byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byung ba'i tshe/ thabs se mkhas pang ting nge 'dzin rnams
167b1(yum): cam bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan mam thu dang / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang/
167b2(yum): mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams minan ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'das la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ban
167b3(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spong na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ma
167b4(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen tha shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar
167b5(yum): na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkham pa
167b6(yum): ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spod na/ mtshan ma la myod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinam
167b7(yum): ba'athud pa'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bdag med ces bgyi bar myong ma mtshan ma la myong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub tham
167b8(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyong na mtshan ma la pyod do/

168a2(yum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs

168a5(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab sa mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi na rnams rtag ces bgyi bar myong sa mtshan
168a6(yum): snga yU nga / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sa myong ba'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzung sa
168a7(yum): ma mnam cas bgyibar ma na zung chub pa
168a8(yum): byud pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi ni rnams 'ange nas bgyi bar myong na mtshan ma ma sbyang sa/ bcom ldan 'das 'al ci byang chub sems dpa
168b1(yum): mdapa namag par bkyi rolatu phyin pa la byung ba cha/ thabs kyi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug pasngal nes bkye bar byung na mtshan ma sungs
168b2(yum): 'a ba das byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' tshemam pa bkyi rol tu byin la ma srid pa'i tshe/ thabs tshe mkha' / sa kyi rnams nga

172a7(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chom ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dun ces bgyi
172a8(yum): skyo na/ mtshan ma la spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas

172b2(yum): dpa' rgyan zags rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byung ba'i che/ thams ma mkhas 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chol ma dzes pa bco brgyad 'di mas bgyi bar nga
172b3(yum): ma la bud do/ bcom ldan 'das ral te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen tha shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa mthong ba'iH/ thabs mi 'ang
172b4(yum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rdzun 'phrul zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma laspyod du/ bcom ldan 'das pal sa byang chub sems dpa' bam

193b8(yum): byin gyis rlob pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod do// rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang /

194a2(yum): 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
194a3(yum): la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'du bya

194a8(yum): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / ying mi bde ba / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol/
194b1(yum): bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

201a8(yum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig gi rnam par shes pa/
201b1(yum): chen na she
201b2(yum): khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/
201b3(yum): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bya bar mi sbyong / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig gi rnam par shes
201b4(yum): pa'i khams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi skyong zhes bya bar mi
201b5(yum): spyod/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig gi
201b6(yum): rnam par shes pa'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyong / mig gi rnam par shes
201b7(yum): pa'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rna ba'i khams la mi spyod de/
201b8(yum): rna ba'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rna ba'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi skyong / rna ba'i kham
201b9(yum): bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i khams bad/
202a1(yum): med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i khams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar zhub
202a2(yum): stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i khams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rno ba'i khams
202a3(yum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar myi spyod/ rna ba'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i/
202a4(yum): khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / sgra'i khams la mi spyod de/ sgra'i khams kyi mtshan
202a5(yum): ma la mi spyod cing / sgra'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sgra'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyong / sgra'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi
202a6(yum): spyod/ sna'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sgra'i khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sgra'i khams bdag med ces bya ba
202a7(yum): mi stud/ sgra'i khams ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sgra'i khams mazhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sgra'i khams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sgra'i
202a8(yum): khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sgra'i khams mtshan ma med pa ces bya bar mi skyong / sna'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi sgo/
202a9(yum): 'i khams mi stong zhes bya bar mi
202b1(yum): sgra'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sgra'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sgra'i khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rna ba'i
202b2(yum): par shes pa'i khams la mi spyod de/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshon ma la mi spyod cing / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag rje
202b3(yum): bya bar mi sbyod / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mI rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod//
202b4(yum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod / rna ba'i rnam
202b5(yum): par shes pa'i khams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes
202b6(yum): pa'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams spyong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
202b7(yum): mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
202b8(yum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i
203a1(yum): khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam pas
203a2(yum): shes pa'i khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / sna'i khams mi spyod de/ sna'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / sna'i khams rtag
203a3(yum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i khams sa sdug bsngal zhes
203a4(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i khams bdag ces bya bar spyod/ sku'i khams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i khams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/
203a5(yum): snga'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i khams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snga'i khams mi sbyong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i khams
203a6(yum): mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i kham/
203a7(yum): smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snga'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / d+hI'i khams la/
203a8(yum): ma spyod de/ dzaM'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mo skyong cing / dza'i khams rtag ces bya bar ma sbyong / dzaM'i khams mirtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dza
203b1(yum): khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dri'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dri'i khams bdag mod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dri'i khams bdag
203b2(yum): med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dri'i khams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dri'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dri'i khams stong zhes bya bar mi
203b3(yum): spyod/ dri'i khams mi sbyong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dri'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dri'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar
203b4(yum): mi spyod/ dri'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dri'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dri'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi
203b5(yum): spyod/ dri'i khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan
203b6(yum): ma la spyod cing / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar spyod/ sna'i rnam
203b7(yum): par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snga'i rnam par shes pa'i
203b8(yum): khams bdag ces bya bar mi spong / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snga'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
204a1(yum): ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i kham stong zhes
204a2(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod
204a3(yum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i rnam pa
204a4(yum): shes pa'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyong / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khyams
204a5(yum): mi dben zhes bya bar spyod pa dang / lce'i khams la mi spyod/ lce'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyong cing / sgo'i kham sa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod
204a6(yum): kye'i khams myin ga tses bya bar ma stong / sno khams pa hU~Ms b+hA bar su spyong/ rtswa'i khams sdug bsgral zhes bya bar mi spyod/ kye'i khams byung
204a7(yum): ces bya ba mi spyod/ mye'i khams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ kye'i'o khams ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ lce'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod
204a8(yum): lce'i khams song zhes bya bar mi myong/ kye'i khams mi song zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sgo'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ la
204b1(yum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ lce'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ lce'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ lce'i khams
204b2(yum): dben zhes bya bar mi sbyong/ lce'i khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / ro'i khams la mi spyod de/ ro'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mi
204b3(yum): spyod cing / ro'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ro'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ro'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ro'i kham
204b4(yum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ro'i khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ro'i khams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ro'i khamaso zhi zhes bya bar mi
204b5(yum): spyod/ ro'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ro'i khams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ro'i khams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ro'i khams mtshan ma

204b7(yum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ ro'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi sbyong / ro'i khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la spyod
204b8(yum): de lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams brtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ lce'i rnam par shes
205a1(yum): pa'i khams mI rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams pade zhes bya bar mi spyod/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i kham
205a2(yum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyong / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag med ces bya ba

206a8(yum): spyong / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyong / lus kyi rnam por zhes pa'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar ma smi/

206b8(yum): khya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi sbyong ba dang / chos kyi khams la mi spyong de/ chos kyi khams mtshan ma la ma nga /
207a1(yum): cing / chos kyi khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos kyi khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos kyi khams bde zhes bya

209a2(yum): mA zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rlung gi khams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rlung gi khams mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyong/ rlung gi khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba
209a3(yum): mi spyod/ rlung gi khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rlung gi khams smon pa yod ces bya bar m-i spyod/ rlung gi khams smon pa med ces
209a4(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ rlung gi khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rlung gi khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / nam mkha'i khams la mi
209a5(yum): spyod de/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams mi rtag ces bya ba
209a6(yum): mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams bred zhes bya bar mo spyod/ nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams bdag
209a7(yum): sa bya bar ma spyod/ nam mkha'i khams bdag sa bya bar mi spyod/ nam mi khwa'i khams ni nas bya bar mi stod/ nam mkha'i khams ma
209a8(yum): zhi zhes bya bar mo spyod/ nam mkha' khams stong zhes bya bar mi sbyong / nam mkha'i khams mi stong ces bya bar mi skyong / nam mkha'i khams
209b1(yum): mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams smon pa yod nas bya bar du slong

209b4(yum): mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyong / rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyong/ rnam par shes pa'i khams

216a6(yum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes
216a7(yum): rnab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu bla mi dben zhes bya bar mi sbyong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag pa
216a8(yum): dum bu gnyis pa/ bam po gsum cu rba grwapa/ rang song ba nyid la ma srung / nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshanam la ma
216b1(yum): rang rung ba nyid bdag ces ma par mi spyod/ rang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/
216b2(yum): cing / nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar ma spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mi rgyug ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyong/ rang stong pargyu
216b3(yum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyo'o/ nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi
216b4(yum): spyod/ nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mi sdong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang
216b5(yum): bcing mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong
216b6(yum): pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyong
216b7(yum): cing / phyi stong bya rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi skyong ba nyid sdug bsnga
216b8(yum): zhes bya bar mi sbyong / phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyong / phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi
216b9(yum): spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa ni
217a1(yum): mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byi stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces byu ba
217a2(yum): ni skyong / phyi stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod
217a3(yum): ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong
217a4(yum): pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyin
217a5(yum): stong pa nyid bdag ces par mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong
217a6(yum): banyid ma ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rgyunang song ba nyid kyi spyod nas bya bar mi spyong/ byin skyong
217a7(yum): gling mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi spyong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ byi nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod
217a8(yum): byi nang smon med ces bya bar mi myong / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byi nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar ma spyod pa dang /
217b1(yum): bcang sang ba nyid la ma spyo / stong ba rkang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myad cung / stong pa nyid stong ba nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spong / spyong pa tshad spyong
217b2(yum): nyid myi rtag nas bya bar mi snad/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar ma spyong / stong pa nyid spyong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ spong
217b3(yum): ngastong ba nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod// spyod pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar mi spyong
217b4(yum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar ma zha zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi stong
217b5(yum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong
217b6(yum): ba nyid stong pa nyid smyon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes
217b7(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dpon zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma
217b8(yum): lam spyod cing / chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar ma spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar
218a1(yum): mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa
218a2(yum): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po spyod pa nyid ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid song
218a3(yum): bya bar mi stong / chen po stong pa nyid mi spyong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod / chen po stong pa nyid mtshan
218a4(yum): ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po

218b1(yum): po spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong nas bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi skyong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ do dumu pa stong pa nyid mnan ma yod ces byag
218b2(yum): mi stod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa song ba nyid smon pa med
218b3(yum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyi
218b4(yum): la mi spyod de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag
218b5(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid

218b8(yum): stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar
219a1(yum): mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/

219a6(yum): 'dus ma byas spyod pa nyid stong shes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mo stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod/
219a7(yum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa spyod mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa yong ces bya bar ma spyod/ 'a
219a8(yum): mabyas stong pa nyid spon pa med ces bya bar mi spyong / 'dus ma byas song ba nyid dben nas bya bar mi myong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dben ni
219b1(yum): rtsa bar mi spyod pa dang / mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyong cing / mtha' las 'dra
219b2(yum): bstong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya

219b8(yum): nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/
220a1(yum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma man spyod cing / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma da
220a2(yum): tham med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi sbyong/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug
220a3(yum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar
220a4(yum): mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa
220a5(yum): stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa mtshan ma yod ces

220a8(yum): tham med pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la ma spyod de/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi
220b1(yum): stod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa spyod pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bye zhes bya

220b4(yum): bstong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar

220b7(yum): bar mi spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces
220b8(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa sdug

222a1(yum): mi dmigs stong pa nyid la mi spyod

223a8(yum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ dngos po meng ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la ma skyong cing / dngos po med pa'i
223b1(yum): ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid rtag ces bya ba mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid song

223b4(yum): par mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyong
223b5(yum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngo
223b6(yum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod
223b7(yum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod / dngos po med de
223b8(yum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi spyod de/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan
224a1(yum): mal spyod cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod
224a2(yum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa pade zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag ces
224a3(yum): bya bar mi stong / zan pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni zhes bya bar mi spyong / dran pa nye bar
224a4(yum): gzhag pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi
224a5(yum): spyod/ dran pa le bar gzhag pa rnams man ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar
224a6(yum): gzhag pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben
224a7(yum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi spyod de/ yang dag par stong ba
224a8(yum): rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / yang dag par song ba rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par song ba rnams mi rtag ces bya bar ma myong
224b1(yum): yang dag par spyod pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spod ba rnams bdan
224b2(yum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spyong ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang ngan
224b3(yum): par spong ba rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi stong zhes bya bar
224b4(yum): spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par
224b5(yum): ba rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bya ba
224b6(yum): ma spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi spyod de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
224b7(yum): mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyen
224b8(yum): pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod
225a1(yum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
225a2(yum): rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrus
225a3(yum): gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pa yod/
225a4(yum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
225a5(yum): rkang pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la mi spyod de/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dbang po rnams rtag /
225a6(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams bde zhes bya bar mi myong / dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma
225a7(yum): spyod/ dbang po rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams ni skyes bya bar ma spyad / dang
225a8(yum): po rnams mazhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams song zhes bya bar mi spyong / dbang po rnams ma stong zhes bya bar ma spyong / dbang po rnams maH
225b1(yum): ma yod ces bya bar ma sbyong / dbang po rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams ston
225b2(yum): med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la mi spyong
225b3(yum): skyostobs rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar mi sbyod/ stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams pa
225b4(yum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams bdag med ces
225b5(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams spyong zhes bya ba mi spyod/ stong
225b6(yum): rnams mi song zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ spyo bas
225b7(yum): rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / spobs
225b8(yum): rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi spyod de/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /
226a1(yum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams cag ces zla bar mispyod/ zung chub kyi sa nA la ga rnams su rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/
226a2(yum): chub kyi yan lagA rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag nas
226a3(yum): bdag ces par mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/
226a4(yum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skyong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi
226a5(yum): stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan log rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma med ces bya
226a6(yum): par mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smyon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bya
226a7(yum): chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mo dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'o lam ma//
226a8(yum): lag brgyad pa la mi spyod de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ba'i mtshan ma ma myong cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad panag ces/
226b1(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya bar mi stod
226b2(yum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi stod/ 'phags pa'i lAm yan lag brgyud pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags
226b3(yum): pa'i lam yan lag bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lamo yan lag brgyad
226b4(yum): bzhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi stong zhes bya ba
226b5(yum): mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lA ma yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma med ces bya
226b6(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa med ces
226b7(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dben zhes bya ba
226b8(yum): mi spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa
227a1(yum): rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde/
227a2(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags
227a3(yum): pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyong/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma nI zhes byas/
227a4(yum): mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi skyong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
227a5(yum): rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ston pa /
227a6(yum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi skyeng
227a7(yum): 'dags pa'i badzin pa rnams med ben rjes bya bar mi spyod ba dang / zasam gtan rnams la ba spyod de/ bsam gtan rnams kyimatshun ma lam sto
227a8(yum): bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyong / bosam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spong / bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/
227b1(yum): bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi smod/ bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya bar ma
227b2(yum): spyod/ bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar mi sbyong /
227b3(yum): bsam gtan rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma med ces bya ba
227b4(yum): mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams dben zhe
227b5(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la mi spyod de/ tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la spyod cing
227b6(yum): tshad med pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chang med pa rnam
227b7(yum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams bdag med pa ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams
227b8(yum): zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams mi stong zhes bya
228a1(yum): par mi sbyong / chad myed pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi stong / chad med pa rnams mtshan ma med ces zla bar ma spyod/
228a2(yum): tshad med pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bya bar ma
228a3(yum): spyong/ tshad med pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ma stod de/ gzugs
228a4(yum): mod pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / gzugs med pa'i snyom smra par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces b+hA bar mi spyod/
228a5(yum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde nas bya ba ma stong
228a6(yum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi
228a7(yum): stong / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi stod/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni zhes bya
228a8(yum): bar mamyong / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams mazhinas bya bar spong / gzugs med pa'i rnams par 'jug pa rnams nga/
228b1(yum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
228b2(yum): mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyong / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
228b3(yum): par mas 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs
228b4(yum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mo sbyong pa dang /
228b5(yum): rnam par thar pa rnams la mi spyod de/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rnam par rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa
228b6(yum): rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams drug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyong / rnam par thar pa rnams bdag ces par mi stod/ rnam
228b7(yum): thar pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/
228b8(yum): par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar
229a1(yum): rnam par thar par rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam pa
229a2(yum): thar pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar ma stod/ rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi sbyang
229a3(yum): chab mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi spyod de/ thar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la ma sna
229a4(yum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyo
229a5(yum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams sdug bsngal no/
229a6(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthur gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam
229a7(yum): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
229a8(yum): 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
229b1(yum): par 'jug pa rnams mi skad zhes bya bar mi 'byung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar byung / mthar sa
229b2(yum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyong / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba
229b3(yum): mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dge
229b4(yum): zhes bya bar mi sbyong / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mau dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid da
229b5(yum): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la mi spyod de/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smin pa med pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rnam
229b6(yum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang
229b7(yum): smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bde zhes bya bar mi sbyong/ rnam pa
229b8(yum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa
230a1(yum): dang smon pa med pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang ston pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna
230a2(yum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pam
230a3(yum): ni zhes bya bar spyod/ rnam par thar pa so stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa smon pa med pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste
230a4(yum): pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi sbyong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan ma spong
230a5(yum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo sbyong pa nyid dang mtshan sa med ba dang smon pa med pa smra tshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par gyur ba'i sgra
230a6(yum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa smyon pa yod ces bya bar mi sbyong / rnam par thar pa'i ga / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa
230a7(yum): pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo spong ba nyid dang mtshan ma mong ba dang smon pa med pa dben zhes bya bar mi stong/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
230a8(yum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ming ben zhes bya bar ma spong ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi myong ngo / mngon par shes pa shes pa rnam/
230b1(yum): kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnam mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa
230b2(yum): rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ man
230b3(yum): par shes pa rna rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar ma
230b4(yum): spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan
230b5(yum): ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod
230b6(yum): mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi dpon
230b7(yum): zhes bya bar mi sbyong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi spyod de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi skyob cing / ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces
230b8(yum): bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsnga
231a1(yum): zhes zla bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces zla bar ma spyod/ ti nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/
231a2(yum): nge 'dzin rnams ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
231a3(yum): stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzi
231a4(yum): rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya bor mi stod/ ti

260a3(yum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems

260a6(yum): ting nge 'dzin kyang byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor
260a7(yum): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting 'dzin de la 'dushe suM byed dam raba' byor rgyu
260a8(yum): spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ga dra te'i bu 'dugs su byed pa med// smras pa ji sa ngas 'dug su byed pa mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ rtogs pa med pa'i phyir/
260b1(yum): smras pa de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtag pa med/ de ltar rigs kyi bu de ting 'dzin de ma chog man
260b2(yum): tshad ldan papa ra tI'i bu rnam grangs des na rigs kyi bu ti 'dzin de la rnam par shes pa mdo// 'du shes byed par 'gyur ba med// smras pa tshe dang ldan par
260b3(yum): 'byor ci'i rnam par shes par byed pa med cing / 'du shesu 'gyur ba med// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ting 'dzin de yang med/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
260b4(yum): chen po de ya da pa'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med// 'du she su 'gyur ba mdo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan parab 'gyur la leg so zhes bya ba gnang ste/
260b5(yum): 'byor legaso leg so// tshig 'di ni legs par bag do// ji ltar ras nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa de bshad pa ni 'di yin
260b6(yum): byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// brtson 'gru
260b7(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab pa bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslangs
260b8(yum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnas la bslab par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba rnam la bslab par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam la bslab par bya'o// dbang po rnas bslab par bya'o// stobs
261a1(yum): rnams la bslab par bya'o/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab pa bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bya'o//
261a2(yum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bya'o// tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// gzugs med pa'i
261a3(yum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// rnam par thar pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslas
261a4(yum): par bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la bslab par bya'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bya'o//
261a5(yum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o// gzungs kyi blo rnams la bslab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o// mi 'gro
261a6(yum): pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// byams pa chen po la brlab par bya'o// nga
261a7(yum): rje chen po la bslab par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par rgyu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan na rang te'i bus bcom ldan
261a8(yum): 'das la 'di skad ces gas ma te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la med dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bcom
261b1(yum): ba bras ga gyi ba la tsun pam mang mags pa'i rgyal gyis brdzun sa/ btsun la grub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma ma rnas pa'i rdzu dug
261b2(yum): ba ba rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bas ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol su phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis badz+ra dza/ sbyin pa'i
261b3(yum): byin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul bslob po// dran pa nye bar banag pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsngob pa/ yang das par spong ba rnams la mi dam
261b4(yum): ba'i tshul gyis bslab bo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brjor pa/ dbang po rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brjong
261b5(yum): stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslo 'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bathob bo// 'phags pa'i lam
261b6(yum): yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslob bo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i bslob po// bsam gtan rnams la ming min
261b7(yum): pa'i tshul gyis bslob bo// tshad med pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsngob bo// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi
261b8(yum): pa'i tshul gyis bslob bo// rnam par thar pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslob bo// mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnams par 'thun pa rnams
262a1(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslob bo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul bsla
262a2(yum): po mngon par shes pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slo ba/ gzungs kyis blo rnam la ming
262a3(yum): pa'i tshul gyis bslob po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslob po// mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
262a4(yum): bslob bo// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslob po// byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslob bo// snying
262a5(yum): rje chen po la mi dmigs pa'i ba'i tshul gyis bsngo bo po// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslob po// bcom ldan
262a6(yum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brlob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i
262a7(yum): tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa mi dmi rnas pa'i rdul gyis brjo pa yin brtson 'grub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi mnas
262a8(yum): pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i
262b1(yum): na lam du na ma kya pa gyu rgyas mamam mam dran na ra ma ma sa
262b2(yum): bslob pa lam/ yang dag par song ba rnams la mi dmigs pa'i rdul gyimathob pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rang pa rnamasal mi dmigs pa'i dus kyi brjon pa
262b3(yum): dbang po rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ spobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi
262b4(yum): pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtswa
262b5(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thob pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ tshad med pa rnams la mi dmi dam pa'i tshul gyi
262b6(yum): slob pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams la mi dmams pa'i
262b7(yum): tshul gyis slob pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i rnga zung /
262b8(yum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnamamasas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi ma mtshan
263a1(yum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
263a2(yum): stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yi ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
263a3(yum): la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byams pa chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin
263a4(yum): sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
263a5(yum): kyis bka' stsal ba/ sharA dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i TI bdag mi dmigs pa// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sems can mi dmigs mo// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
263a6(yum): 'grob mid monam sa/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'khob med migs pa/ b+hes bu ming mi rnam mo// gang zar me dmigs / shed can ming mi'i ma/ da pa /
263a7(yum): mi dmigs so// byed pa'i mi dmigs/ tshor bab med mi mtho rnam pa po med mi pa po// mdzang 'a bo med migs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rgyur btsug ming kyi
263a8(yum): shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshor ba mi dmigs song/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du shes ming mi sa so// rga shin du rnam par dan pa'i phyir 'dra byed med ma rim po/
263b1(yum): su rnam par dag pa'i byed rnam par shes pa mad mi chan shin du rnam par nga ga pa'i rgyur gyir ming tshanam/ shin turnam par dag pa'i phyir ra bsti pa na
263b2(yum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dge pa'i phyir bu mi dmimams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chul mi 'i/ shin du rnam pa
263b3(yum): pa'i phyir ming mi dmigs po// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs mi dmin mo// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nA mi dmigs pa// shin tu rnam par dran pa'i phyir hUM
263b4(yum): mi dmigs pa// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dan po'i phyir reg mi dmings so// shin tu rnam pa ngo ba'i phyir chob mau
263b5(yum): na tu rnam par dge pa'i phyir rman gi khams mi dmigapa sa/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyi gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par da
263b6(yum): mi gi na par zhus pa'i khams me myigs / shin tu rnam par das pa'i DU d+hA ba'i khams mid minas su m+b+ha m+b+ha par pa
263b7(yum): spu'i khams mid migan mo// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi man mi mid// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sde'i khams med dzo
263b8(yum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par/
264a1(yum): dag pa'i phyir lce'i khamapa ming tshogs pa// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes
264a2(yum): pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rog gi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu
264a3(yum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i kham pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
264a4(yum): chos kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha'i khams
264a5(yum): dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chu'i khams mi dmigs po// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mo'i khams ming mam shin tu rnam
264a6(yum): par dag pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par
264a7(yum): dag pa'i phyir ma rig pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du byed mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi dkyi

266b8(yum): don dam pastong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa spong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid

268b2(yum): 'dus bya stong banyid dang / 'dus ma byas sang pa nyid dang / mtha' mas 'das pamang sa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa rkang bzhin dang / dor ba med pa mang brji 'i
268b3(yum): rang bzhin song banyid dang / chos thams cad song 'anyid das rang gi mtshan nyid stong banyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong panyid dang / dngas po med pa mong pa nyid dang ngob nyid dang
