281a2(yum): med pa'i dzi ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod ba ma yin no// ba ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po rnams stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi drang song ba nyid dang / song pa song pa nyid dang / ched/
281a3(yum): postong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pas
281a4(yum): pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang
281a5(yum): dngos po med pa song pa nyid dang / ngo za nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa pa yin no// sha ra dwa dri'i bu spobs rnams nang song pa nyid dang
281a6(yum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid song pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas song pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas /
281a7(yum): banyid dang / mtha' les 'das pa song pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tham med pa song pa nyid dang / dor ba med pasong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngang/ chos thams cad ma
281a8(yum): nyid dang rang gi tshad nyid song pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pasong pa nyid dang / nges pa meng bsong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'ing ba nyid zang
281b1(yum): pa yin du/ ba bya chub kyi yan la garnams na pa dang / byagang ba nyid dang / phyidang nga pa nyid / rlung ba sna pa / rab dud
281b2(yum): pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas song pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog pa dang tha ma med pa song
281b3(yum): nyid dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
281b4(yum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lam rnams nang stong pa nyid dang /
281b5(yum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas
281b6(yum): stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa song pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha mi dang stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong
281b7(yum): nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po me'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
281b8(yum): kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa rang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa
282a1(yum): nyid dang / dod dab pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / srog ma dang sa
282a2(yum): med nga stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad song pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa song
282a3(yum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa song pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan rnams nga
282a4(yum): stong pa nyid dang / phyi srong pa nyid dang / byi dang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po snang ba nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang
282a5(yum): 'dus ma byas song pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa snang pa nyid dang / thog ma dang bram med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa song pa nyid dang / rang bzhin seng pa nyid dang / sa
282a6(yum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i /
282a7(yum): pating stong nyid kyi phyir yang ba ma yin no// shar dwa ti'i bu cad med pa rnams dang song pa nyid dang / bye stong pa nyid dang / phyi rang song pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
282a8(yum): dang shi nga / rang sa pa sang ba nyid dang / 'dus byas kyang pa nyid dang/ 'dus pa dris song ba'i dang / rang 'o las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / ga sa tha ma ya
282b1(yum): panyi dang / ngor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang
282b2(yum): dngos po meng pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shar dwa ti'i bu gzugs med pa'i spoms pa
282b3(yum): 'jug pa rnams dang sang pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / phyi dang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen pa snang pa nyid dang / do ngam pa nyid dang / 'dus byas
282b4(yum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / klog ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang ba zhin
282b5(yum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
282b6(yum): nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa brgyad nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid/
282b7(yum): dang stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas song ba nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
282b8(yum): dang theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid song ba nyid
283a1(yum): pi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa ba nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos pa med pa'i dang nyidi stong ba nyid kyi phyir yod ngam yin
283a2(yum): dra ti'i bu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug byang gu dang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
283a3(yum): po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong po nyid dang / 'dus ma byas song pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thos ma dang bla che
283a4(yum): bsnang pazhid dang / dor med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang // mi migs pa
283a5(yum): bsong ba nyid dang / dngos po med bsong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'o ngo bo zhing steng pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// par dwa ti'i bur
283a6(yum): pa yang pa nyid dang mdza pa med pang spod pa med pa nang song pa nyid dang/ byestong pa nyid dang / phyinang stong panyid nga/ stong pa nyid dang / che ba da nga/
283a7(yum): dor dpa pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thig ma nga ma med pa med pa nyid
283a8(yum): bamed pa sang banyid dang / rang bzhin spong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad sang da nyid dang / rang gi batshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong panyid dang /
283b1(yum): dngos po red pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa rnams nang
283b2(yum): pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byin stong pa nyid dang / song stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
283b3(yum): pabyas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
283b4(yum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
283b5(yum): ring pa'i bri bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / song pa nyid
283b6(yum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa sa
283b7(yum): pa nyid dang thog pa dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
283b8(yum): stong pa nyid dang / mi dpags pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yong pa ma
284a1(yum): yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo rnams nang song ba nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen bsna
284a2(yum): panyid dang / don dam po nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang bra ma med pa song
284a3(yum): nyid dang / dor pa med pa stong pa nyid dang / dru bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid song pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa song ba
284a4(yum): dang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shar dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa
284a5(yum): stobs rnams nang pa stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa stong nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / dor dam pa nyid dang /
284a6(yum): 'dus byas srung pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas song pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / gleg ma ngang tha pa med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa
284a7(yum): nga bani spong bzhi nga/ chos thams cang stong pa nyid dang / ra gam rgya nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa song pa nyid dang / ngos po med pa'i snong nyid
284a8(yum): ra zhing song pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang kyi phyir yod pa ma yin na// shar dwa ti'i bum 'jigs pa pa ni dang song pa nyid dang / phyi nang ning nga /
284b1(yum): phyinang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas song pa nyid dang /
284b2(yum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad spong ba nyid
284b3(yum): dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
284b4(yum): kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bus so yang dag par rig pa rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid spong
284b5(yum): nyid dang chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa stong pa nyid dang /
284b6(yum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid da
284b7(yum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti/
284b8(yum): bu snying rje chen po nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
285a1(yum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang bra ma med pa song pa nyid dang
285a2(yum): don pa med pa song pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
285a3(yum): po da pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i rnga bo tshad stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shar dwa ta'o bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
285a4(yum): brgyad nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyinang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas
285a5(yum): song ba nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pasong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang bra ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / don pa med pa song panyid dang / 'ang
285a6(yum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad song pa nyid dang / rang ba nig mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po medang stong pa nyid dang / nga nyis
285a7(yum): bzhi dang / ngas pa meng 'ang bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshur yod pam yin na// de la khyis ma ma'i bo rnams med pa la mdzu bar rnam/ med pa la mdzin par na/ de dag
285a8(yum): sa ngas su ga ga ya la nga 'dzin sa nga tsha tshum med ngas da pa yigs 'as/ yang me mi da ga
285b1(yum): rnag dun na na rgyu sa
285b2(yum): na da // ban 'dus kyi pa ma man pad/ khamamapan bya ma tshud pa la /
285b3(yum): pa la mngon par med to// nang song pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// phyi nang song ba nyid la mngon par zhen to// stong pa nyid stong ba nying la
285b4(yum): zhe ched ba sang ba nyid la mngon par zhen to// don dam mngon par na to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zher to// 'dus pa byas song pa nyid la mngod par ni
285b5(yum): 'tha' las 'das pa spong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// thog ma dang bye ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dor ba med pa sang pa nyid la mngon par men to// rang ba'i dus
285b6(yum): panyid la mngon par zhen to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// rang mi tshan stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// mi dmigs pa song ba so nyid la mngon par mend do//
285b7(yum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dran pa nye bar gzhag
285b8(yum): pa rnams la ni mngon par zhen to// yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par zhen to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen to//
286a1(yum): sobs rnams la mngon par rten to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par zhen to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen
286a2(yum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// bsam gtan rnams la mngon par len to// tshad med pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// gzugs la med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
286a3(yum): rnams la mngon par nad to// rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par rnyed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i spongs par 'jug pa rnams la mngon pa shin to// rnam par gyur ba'i sa
286a4(yum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen to// mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
286a5(yum): mngon par zhen to// byams pa chen po la mngon par zhin to// snying rje chen po la mngon par rten to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to// mi 'jigs pa
286a6(yum): la mngon par na to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par rten to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco bcud la mngon par rten to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhen
286a7(yum): nas yod du ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de gamigs pamadza // ci rigs mi mthong // gzugs rigs pa thongango // nor bamigs mi mthong ba
286a8(yum): 'du shes ma shes mi mthong ngo // 'du byed mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig le shes ma mthong ngo // rnab mi shes mi mthong ngo // sA ri shes mi tsha/
286b1(yum): sa mdzad// sus rishes mi mdza// ri 'i shes mi mdzod// gzugs mishes pa mang // sna ri shes pa rjod/ shes pa 'a // gas
286b2(yum): ga gas pa // sa rigs pa mamang // mig gi rnam pa shes ky-i kya // rna ba'i rna pa shes pa'i shes ma dzad// sa pa shes
286b3(yum): mi mthong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa
286b4(yum): mi shes mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi bres mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma
286b5(yum): shes mi mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi
286b6(yum): shes mi mthong ngo // snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg
286b7(yum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshul khrims
286b8(yum): la du phyidan pa tshigs mi mthong ngo // bzod pa'i rol tu phyin pa rigs mi mthong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // ngasam gtan gyi pha rol tu
287a1(yum): phyi spong ba nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //
287a2(yum): byed pa gas / zhes kyi byol du byed pa gas mi byung // du srong nyid kyi shes mi rung // phy-ir slod tha~Md migis ma ma
287a3(yum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid migs mi mthong ngo // chen po song pa nyid migs mir thong ngo // don dam pasong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'dus byas song pa nyid mi shes mi mang
287a4(yum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi mthong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi mthong ngo // thog ma bla ma med pa stong pa nyid mi zhes mi mthong ngo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi
287a5(yum): mthong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // mi dmigs pa
287a6(yum): stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni shes mi mthong ngo // ngo bo nyid song ba nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa'i dro ba nyid stong ba nyid mi shes mi
287a7(yum): nga ngo// dran panye bar gzhug pa bani mi shes mi mdzod// yang dag par snang ba ba ni rigs mi mthong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa bani mi gas mi mthong ngo // dang po lnga rigs
287a8(yum): mang // gabs lnga ni shes me thong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lus rnams mi shes mi mthong // 'dagus pasngal ma yan lag brgyad pa'i zhes mdzad// 'ag
287a9(yum): pa'i bden pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // bsam gtad rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // chang med pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzugs med pa'i stobs par 'jug pa
287b1(yum): mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par thar pa brgyad mi shes mi mthong ngo // mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par thar pa'i sa song ba ning
287b2(yum): mtshan med pa dang spong ba med pa dri zhes mi mthong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzungs kyi snga rnams pa shes /
287b3(yum): mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi mi mthong ngo // mi 'jigs pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // byams pa
287b4(yum): chen po mi shes mi mthong ngo // snying rje chen po mi shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi mi mthong ngo // de ltar de dag byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dod pa
287b5(yum): de dag 'byung ba ma yin no// gang nas byung ba ma yin no// 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i
287b6(yum): khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// nyan thos kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni yod mi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid mi ches na
287b7(yum): gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes byas par yid mchis so// tshor 'a tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'du shes 'du shes kyis spong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so
287b8(yum): 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi mig gi 'dus te stong zhes bya bar yid
288a1(yum): din+d+res su / rngub pas stod zhes bya bar yid michis so// sa sdus song zhes bya bar yid ni ches sa// lce lces grong zhes bya bar ya mtshas
288a2(yum): lus kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid yid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// gzugs gzugs kyis stong nas bya bar yid mi ches so// sA sAs
288a3(yum): stong nas bya bar yid mi ches so// dri dris stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// roras stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rog reg gis song zhes bya bar yid mi ches so
288a4(yum): chos chos kyis snong zhes bya bar yid michis so// mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pa sa'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid ni chos so// rna ba'i rnam
288a5(yum): pa shes parna ba'i rnam par shes pas srong zhes bya bar yid mchis so// snga'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas song zhes bya bar yid mchis so// lce rnam
288a6(yum): par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas seng zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yang
288a7(yum): rnam pa shes pa'i kyi rnam par byas pas steng nas bya bar yid mchis so// yigo gi 'dus te reg pamig gi 'dus te reg pas song zhes bya bar ying mchis so// rna ba'i
288a8(yum): rig pa'i 'dus te rig pas spong zhes bya bar yid ma ches so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa snga'i 'dus te reg pas song 'a bar yid miches so// khre'i 'dus te reg pa sde'i du
288b1(yum): ub cwa 'jas ni grapas stod nas bya bar yid kyichis so// lus kyi 'dus te rig pa lus kyi 'dus te ri gapas srang zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid kyi 'dus
288b2(yum): pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas snong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgya gyi cho d+ha mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar yid
288b3(yum): so/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor brna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sna'i
288b4(yum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid michis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas spong zhes bya bar
288b5(yum): yid mi ches so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
288b6(yum): kyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong nas bya bar yid mi ches so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas song nas bya bar yid mi ches so// tshul khrims kyi rol
288b7(yum): tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas song zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// brjod
288b8(yum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas song
289a1(yum): zhes bya bar srid kyi ches so// sa rab kyi shol tu phyid pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas song nus bya bar yid ni ches so// nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa
289a2(yum): kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis song zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// phyi nang song pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches
289a3(yum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong ba nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yang mi ches so// chen po stong pa nyid chen po song ba nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mchis so// don dpapa
289a4(yum): stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis snang zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas song pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'dus
289a5(yum): byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis seng zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mtha' las 'angs pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya ba/
289a6(yum): yi ma rjes su// rdzog dang rje ma med pa stong pa nyid theg mdang tha ma med pa stong zhes bya bar yid dri rjes so// do ba med pa stong pa nyid do bzed ba song pa nid kyis nganas
289a7(yum): bya bar yid mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis song zhes bya bar yid po nyes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos rnams cad song pa nyid kyis
289a8(yum): nas bya bar yid ma ches so// rang gi sa tsha nyid song sa nyid rung gyi mtshad nyid dang pa nyid kyis dang ces bya bar yid michis so// dwa migs pa song panyid med migs/
289b1(yum): pa song ba nyid kyis song zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// ngo bo nyid stong ba'i
289b2(yum): ngo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches

289b4(yum): yid mi ches so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bani rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dbang po lnga dbang po rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches
289b5(yum): stobs lnga stobs rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis song bya bar yid mi cheso// 'phags pa
289b6(yum): lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'phags pa'i bden rnams kyis stong nas
289b7(yum): bya bar yid mi ches so// bsam gtan bani bsam gtan rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tshad med pa pa ni tshad med pa rnams kyis song zhes bya bar yid
289b8(yum): mchis so// gzugs med pa'i stoms par 'jug pa pa ni gzugs med pa'i skams pa 'jug pa rnams kyi stong zhes bya bar yad mi ches so// rnam pa thar pa brgya
290a1(yum): rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis song zhes bya yid mi ches so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
290a2(yum): dgus song zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i na stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas sang

290b1(yum): 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu song zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis slong zhes bya bar yid mi chis sa// rang byang chung rang bya chub kyi
290b2(yum): sr-i nas ba yid de ces so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyis spang zhes bya bar yid mchis so// rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi ma
290b3(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyis song zhes bya bar yid michis so// de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin no// tshul

292a1(yum): par zhen pa yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par rten pa yin/ 'dod chags la mngon par rten yin/ ne snang la mngon par rten pa yin/

293b2(yum): ting du 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheran po thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par nen/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol

294a1(yum): nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon
294a2(yum): par rten/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par nen/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
294a3(yum): brtags cing mngon par nen/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams la brtags cing mngon par zhen/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rdzu phrul
294a4(yum): rkang pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dbang po rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stobs rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ byang chub kyi yan lag/
294a5(yum): rnams la brtags shing mngon bar zhen/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par nes/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtags shing ma
294a6(yum): bar chen/ bsam gtan rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshang med pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par nen/ gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa
294a7(yum): la brtags shing mngon par rnyen/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhed/ mdzar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul brdags shing ma
294a8(yum): byar ne pa rnam par thar pa'i sde stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la brtags shing mngon par nem/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtags shing mdzo/
294b1(yum): bzhed ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcul bajag
294b2(yum): gling mngon par zhen/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ seM sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtags cing mngon par med/ byams pa chen po la brnags
294b3(yum): shing mngon par zhen/ snying rje chen po la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thams cad shes pa nyi la
294b4(yum): brtags shing mngon par zhen/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ shA ra dwa ti'i
294b5(yum): du rnams grangs denges na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/
294b6(yum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan ldan 'das de ltar lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnams pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba
294b7(yum): legs ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa
294b8(yum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
295a1(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i rgya
295a2(yum): 'byung ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
295a3(yum): dmyigs cing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chi rung gis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslob pa ni ming mig
295a4(yum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la skye
295a5(yum): pa'i tshing brjod 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de lce'i slob pa mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
295a6(yum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
295a7(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brjod pa'i rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs cing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/
295a8(yum): ti'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pani/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rje/
295b1(yum): 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs ci
295b2(yum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi
295b3(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
295b4(yum): tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar slob pa ni/
295b5(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dum bu gnyis pa/ bram po ba na
295b6(yum): pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang song pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par
295b7(yum): rjes su ma mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa tha
295b8(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag
296a1(yum): par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs
296a2(yum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa
296a3(yum): nyid de ma dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni migs
296a4(yum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shar da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid snang
296a5(yum): pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi
296a6(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cadamakhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rba dri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyi la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po zung
296a7(yum): nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar-i dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar sgrub pa ni ming mi
296a8(yum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la srung ba'itshe/ don dam /
296b1(yum): stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni ma
296b2(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ltar spong
296b3(yum): ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i chas
296b4(yum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
296b5(yum): phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las
296b6(yum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
296b7(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
296b8(yum): dpa' chen po thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
297a1(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de sngar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gar dwa
297a2(yum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med pa song pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ bar dwa di'i bu
297a3(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu
297a4(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su ma mthongs/ bar dwa ti'i bu
297a5(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rang
297a6(yum): te'i dri byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad spyod pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yade ming migs shing yang rig par rjes su ma
297a7(yum): mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
297a8(yum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs
297b1(yum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
297b2(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dmigs pa snang
297b3(yum): pa nyid de dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi
297b4(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos
297b5(yum): po med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing drag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen popo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni
297b6(yum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe//
297b7(yum): bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong su// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni
297b8(yum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la skyo
298a1(yum): pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shadwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
298a2(yum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i du byang chub sems
298a3(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa de dag dmigs gling yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ gar
298a4(yum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /
298a5(yum): bar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pastong ba de dag mi dmigs shing yang dge po rjes su
298a6(yum): mimathong ste/ ba ra dwa ti'i bya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
298a7(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams la spyong pa'i \u0f7f/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rlung pa de dag mi dngas
298a8(yum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i/
298b1(yum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po de dag mi dmig
298b2(yum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la nga lar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshu
298b3(yum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stongs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs de dag mi dmigs
298b4(yum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob ba ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul
298b5(yum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yang yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub
298b6(yum): kyi yan lag de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
298b7(yum): slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam
298b8(yum): yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
299a1(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
299a2(yum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su
299a3(yum): mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
299a4(yum): nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan de dag mi dmig
299a5(yum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul
299a6(yum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa de dag mong mi
299a7(yum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la de ltar slob pan mi dmigs pa'i tshul
299a8(yum): kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams la spyod
299b1(yum): ba'i tshi gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
299b2(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar srab po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' se
299b3(yum): dpa' chen po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
299b4(yum): ngo shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni migs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
299b5(yum): dpa' chen po mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag mi dmigs shing yang
299b6(yum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
299b7(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon
299b8(yum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i byang chub sem/
300a1(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spro ba ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
300a2(yum): shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag pa
300a3(yum): rjes su mi mthong sa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni migs pa'i tshul gyis rnam
300a4(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
300a5(yum): na seMngs dpa sa da pa sa sa pa snying migs pa rgyal gyis yu
300a6(yum): banyid du 'byung ngo // ba ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skyed pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag mi dmigs shing yang
300a7(yum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shAr dri nga'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gas rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de lar slob par mi dmigs pa'i
300a8(yum): kyis rjeng pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po band gshegs pa'i stobs bcul spyod /
300b1(yum): chede bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po dag pa dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
300b2(yum): bogs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
300b3(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing yang drag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ ra
300b4(yum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
300b5(yum): du mi 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
300b6(yum): de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa
300b7(yum): ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po la
300b8(yum): spyod pa'i che// byams pa chen po de mi dmigs shing dadag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
301a1(yum): pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar stob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
301a2(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
301a3(yum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub
301a4(yum): sems dpa'i chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag mi dmigs cing yang dag par rjes sum
301a5(yum): mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad ma byed
301a6(yum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang ngag
301a7(yum): par rjes su mi mthong sa/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa 'i mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
301a8(yum): kyang mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // 'dra dri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyis rnam por shes pa nyid la skyed pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam zhes pani
301b1(yum): dmigs ning yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ro mi dmigs pa
301b2(yum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/
301b3(yum): rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
301b4(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu bya ba
301b5(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul
301b6(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags
301b7(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong po nyid la mi dmigs
301b8(yum): pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul
302a1(yum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong/
302a2(yum): pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
302a3(yum): rang ba nin stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams na stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs
302a4(yum): pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
302a5(yum): la mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes
302a6(yum): par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong phrag brgyad pa las le'u drug pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom
302a7(yum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'di ning / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bas
302a8(yum): ying/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thams cad du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram nas mtshon/ bcom
302b1(yum): mAd 'dus de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la nig 'di skad 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gta gyi
302b2(yum): rol tu phyin pa la bsrabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchis
302b3(yum): bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di brtson 'grus
302b4(yum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsrabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram na
302b5(yum): mchi bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri nang / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu
302b6(yum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
302b7(yum): ram nas mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par gyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes du/
302b8(yum): 'di tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
303a1(yum): ram zhes mchi/ bcom ldan 'das de sang du 'dri ba de ladza sad du bas par bgyi/ bcod ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dran ci sdu ma'i gyis
303a2(yum): bu 'di sbyir pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rngam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur rab zhes mtsha
303a3(yum): bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la nig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di nang stong pa nyid la bslabs shing /
303a4(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram nas mchim/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du
303a5(yum): bsan par brtsi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di phyi song pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa sems cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
303a6(yum): ramang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ma zhes mtshan/ bcom ldan 'das de sad 'dri ba de la 'di skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la nig 'di skad
303a7(yum): du 'drin ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di nang song pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ras nas mtshan
303a8(yum): bcom ldan 'dis de seng du tshwa ba de sa nang du sa par bkri/ bcom ldan 'das la mnag 'disang du 'dzinang kyu ma'i skyes bu 'dri grong pa nyid dang nga ny-id la bas
303b1(yum): pathams cad pa khyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro nam chi bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri bde la ji srad du bstan par bgyis
303b2(yum): bcom ldan 'das la la ni ga'od skad du 'dra zhing tsa smra pa'i skyes bu 'di chen po song pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/
303b3(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram nas mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad
303b4(yum): du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
303b5(yum): ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di 'dus byas stong pa
303b6(yum): nyid la bslabs shing rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram nas mtshor/ bcom ldan 'das de
303b7(yum): srang du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsrabs shing rnam pa tham
303b8(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par
304a1(yum): bgyi bcom ldan 'das la la nig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadu
304a2(yum): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram nes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la na/
304a3(yum): 'di sad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di rang ba thog ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsrabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur rab/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
304a4(yum): nyid thob par 'gyur ram nas mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la nig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di
304a5(yum): nga med pa stong pa nyid pal bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mtshon/ bcom ldan
304a6(yum): 'das de sang du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ning ci sgyu ba'i skyes bu'adi rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslabs cing rnam pa thams
304a7(yum): dus khyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab par 'gyu mthus patshon/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'adz+ra ba de la ji skad du brtan par
304a8(yum): bgyi bcom ldan 'das lel nig 'di skad du 'dri ning gyi sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslabs cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ral
304b1(yum): spyad ma byed ni drubapar 'gyur sa zhes pachim/ bcom ldan 'das des du 'dri ba de la'i mang du bstan par brtse/ bco ldan 'das la ma nig 'di nang bu dz+r-i/
304b2(yum): ning rje sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di rang gi mtshad nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying rdzob par la
304b3(yum): ram nas mchi na/ bcom ldan la 'das skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la lo zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mi dmigs pa
304b4(yum): stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das
304b5(yum): de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams

304b7(yum): bgyid bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di ngo bo nyid song ba nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram
304b8(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram nas mtshon/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad/
305a1(yum): du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
305a2(yum): ram pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la
305a3(yum): nig 'dra skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsrabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
305a4(yum): la la nig 'di skad du 'dri nad ni sgyu mo'i skyes bu 'di yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslebs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams
305a5(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du'ang
305a6(yum): ning ji sgyu ra'i skyes bu 'di rje 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa rnams la bsrabs cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyed pa'i
305a7(yum): thong ra ma zhes mchi/ bcom ldan 'das de sad du 'dri ba de mji sad du bstan par bgyi bco ma ldan 'das la la zhig 'di sad du 'drin rgya
305a8(yum): sa rnangs la srabs pa ma sems ca sa byed yod du byung sa rgya'/ ma sa sa mkhyen pa nyid tha 'a
305b1(yum): ldan 'das de snang du tshwa ba de la sang du bsta par ba/ bamam ldan 'das la la nig 'dzinang du 'dzin sbya ba'i skyes bu 'das pas rnams sa brlags
305b2(yum): ya snang sa da pa maud byung ba gyur ram/ mA thams cad mkhyen pa ni thob par 'gyur ros nas mchin la ma ldan 'das desang du 'dring de la
305b3(yum): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri na ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu'ang byang chub kyi yang lag rnams la bsrabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
305b4(yum): pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par brgya
305b5(yum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
305b6(yum): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/

305b8(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ramo zhes mtshon/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'a

306a2(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'dis bu

306a6(yum): 'gyur ram zhes mched/ bcom ldan 'das desang du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstar bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgra ma'i skyes

306a8(yum): mtsha bcom ldan 'das de sed du 'dri ba de la dzis du bsad par brtse/ bcom ldan 'das la lani ga 'di sad du 'drinang gyi sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byir gyis
306b1(yum): gangs pa'i stobs par 'jug pa dgu la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dub par
306b2(yum): 'gyur rab zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par brtsi/ bcom ldan 'das lal zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di rnam
306b3(yum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
306b4(yum): pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma
306b5(yum): skyes bu 'di mngon par shes pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram
306b6(yum): nas mtshan/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di ting nge 'dzin rma/

306b8(yum): de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ning ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa
307a1(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de ska
307a2(yum): du'adi mang du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la nig 'di skad du 'dri na ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brtul bsu
307a3(yum): nga rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dra/
307a4(yum): bde la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
307a5(yum): pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram nas mche ro/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyir/
307a6(yum): bcom ldan 'das la la nig 'di skad du 'dri ning ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'dri so so yang dag par rig pa rnams le bslabs shing / rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa tshad du 'byu
307a7(yum): bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidi thob par 'gyur ram nas mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
