314a6(yum): ldan 'das de ltam lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de rjesam du sems/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyum 'ang
314a7(yum): gzhan ni ga yin sum 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor deji snya du sems/ rnam pa pa'i bcun/
314a8(yum): kyang gzhan la sgyuma'ang gzhan la zhig yin sum 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta mi legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
314b1(yum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan la sgyura'ang gzhan nig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'a
314b2(yum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'ang gzhad la sgyu ma'ang gnan nig yin su pa 'di/
314b3(yum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mngon pa shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la
314b4(yum): sgyu ma 'ang gzhan nig yon snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji sems/ ting nge 'dzin
314b5(yum): rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma 'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
314b6(yum): du sems/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
314b7(yum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma 'ang gzhin zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar
314b8(yum): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol/
315a1(yum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan
315a2(yum): la sgyu ma 'ang gnan ni g.yin sum 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byams
315a3(yum): pa chen po'ang gzhad la sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsolnga pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da
315a4(yum): snyad du sems/ snying rje chen po'ang gzhan la sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
315a5(yum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gnan la sgyu ma 'ang gan zhig yin sngam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
315a6(yum): de ltam lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyadam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la sgyuma'ang gnan nig yan sum 'am/ gsol pa
315a7(yum): bcom ldan 'das de la ma lags so// zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag bcu pa/ dum bu ban+d+ha swA ba/ bam po pazhi mi gyib/ bcom ldan 'das gzung
315a8(yum): kyang gan pa lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs ljing sgyum sgyum nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgrung 'angs
315b1(yum): lags te/ rdor pa nyid kyang sgyum sgyum nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyuba'ang gzhadam lags te/ 'du shes nyid kyang sgru ba
315b2(yum): nyid kyang 'du shes so// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyum snyam nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom
315b3(yum): ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyum sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
315b4(yum): mig kyang gan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig nyid kyang sbyar sgyum nyid kyang mig go// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang
315b5(yum): gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba nyid kyang sgyum sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sna'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sna nyid kyang sgyum sgyur
315b6(yum): nyid kyang sA'o/ bcom ldan 'das lce 'ang gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ lce nyid du kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyang
315b7(yum): gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lus nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lus so// bcom ldan 'das yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gnan
315b8(yum): ma lags te/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid
316a1(yum): snum sgyum nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das sgra'ang gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gnan ma lags te/ sgra nyid kyang snum sna
316a2(yum): nyid kyang sgra'o// bcom ldan 'das dri'ang gzhan mA lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan me lags te/ dri nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dri'o// bcom ldan 'das ro'ang gan
316a3(yum): ma lags/ smra ba 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ro nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ro'o// bcom ldan 'das reg kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te
316a4(yum): reg nyid kyang sgyus sgyu ma nyid kyang reg go// bcom ldan 'das chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyum sgyu ma nyid kyang chos
316a5(yum): bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan me lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam/
316a6(yum): par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhon ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyum sgyu ma nyid
316a7(yum): kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das snga'i rnam par shes pa'ang gnan mi lags/ sgyuma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
316a8(yum): kyum nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sku ba'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i rnam par gas
316b1(yum): nyid kyang sgyum sgyum nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyis
316b2(yum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang snum sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gnad pa lag
316b3(yum): yid kyi rnam par shes nyid kyang sgyum sgyu ma nyid kyang gzhan yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan mi lags/ sgyu ma'ang
316b4(yum): gnan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags
316b5(yum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'du she te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das snga'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma
316b6(yum): legs sgyu ma'ang gnan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyum sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang
316b7(yum): gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyis 'dus
316b8(yum): te reg pa'ang gzhan mo lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'a
317a1(yum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyum sgyum nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus reg
317a2(yum): nga'o// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum 'dra gzhan mi lags te/ mug gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
317a3(yum): nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu me nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'ang gnan ma lags sgyur
317a4(yum): 'dra gnan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das
317a5(yum): snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyed kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgru ba sgyu ma nyid kyang sa
317a6(yum): 'dus de rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg du'i byin gyisatshon pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyuba'ang gzhanam lagyis te/ lce'i 'dus
317a7(yum): robo pa'i rkyen kyis tsho ba nyid kyang sgru ba sgru ba nyid kyang lce'i 'dus ni rig pa'i tshur gyi pa'i// bcom ldan 'das lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor pa
317a8(yum): gnan ma lags/ sgyum 'ang gzhan ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang skyem sgyum nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/
317b1(yum): bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'ang gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang
317b2(yum): sgyum sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan mA lags/ sa'i khams
317b3(yum): nyid kyang stum sgyu ba nyid kyang so'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyum cu
317b4(yum): ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyum nyid kyang ma la
317b5(yum): so/ bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// bcom ldan 'das
317b6(yum): nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das
317b7(yum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sgyum sgyum nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so//
317b8(yum): bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang
318a1(yum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags de/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'ang gnan
318a2(yum): ma lags sgyu ma 'ang gnan ma lags/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi dang gzugs kyang gnan ma lags
318a3(yum): sgyuma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ming dang gzugs kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das skye mched drug kyang ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gnan ma la
318a4(yum): skye mched drug nyid kyang snum sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go// bcom ldan 'das rag pa'ang gnan ma legs/ sgyu ma 'ang gnan ma lags te// reg pa nyid kyang sgyur
318a5(yum): sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gnan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das
318a6(yum): srid pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o// bcom ldan 'das len pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ skye ma
318a7(yum): lags / rkyen pa da kyang snyam sgra nyid kya len 'o// maldan 'das spong po'ang gnan pa lags/ sbruba'ang gnad pa la gas te/ nga cu
318a8(yum): nyid kyang srid pa'o// bcom lda 'das rtse ba'ang ga'adams pas/ skye 'ang gnad ma lags te/ skye ba nyid kyang skyem sgru ba nyid kyang skye ba'o// bcom ldan 'das
318b1(yum): 'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu na 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rga ci nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gnan ma lags/
318b2(yum): sgyuma'ang gnan ma lags te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu mi sgyum nyid kyang sbyid pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol du byed
318b3(yum): pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgrub sgyu ma nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
318b4(yum): ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyum snyam nyid kyang bzod pa'i pharom
318b5(yum): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang
318b6(yum): sgyu mi sgyu ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhon ma lags te
318b7(yum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags
318b8(yum): sgyu ma'ang gnan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyi sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyang
319a1(yum): gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
319a2(yum): ma lags sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang
319a3(yum): gzhan ma lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyum sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
319a4(yum): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid song pa nyid kyang sgyu skye pa nyid kyang spong ba nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chen po song ba nyid gan ma legs/ snum 'ang
319a5(yum): gnan ma lags te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gnan ma lag
319a6(yum): te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyum nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dres byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhanan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gnan pa lags
319a7(yum): 'dus byas snang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus byas stong nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas song pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ skyema'ang gan/ ma lag
319a8(yum): 'dus ma byas song pa nyid kyang skyem skye ba nyid kyang 'dus mo byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das panyid kyang gnan ma lags hU~Mma'ang gnan pa la
319b1(yum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa song ba zhid ngo do// bcom ldan 'das ldog pa dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gnang bsags/
319b2(yum): smra ba'ang gnan ma lags te/ thog mdang tha mi med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyum sgyur nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med de stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gnang
319b3(yum): rmi lags sgyura'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ma sgyum nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gnan/
319b4(yum): ma lags sgyuma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gan
319b5(yum): ma lags sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang sgyum sgyu ma nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
319b6(yum): kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ba'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rang gi mtshar nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das ma dmig
319b7(yum): pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
319b8(yum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de// bcom
320a1(yum): ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ngo bo nyid spyod pa nyid kyang sgyu masgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa ni
320a2(yum): bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyur sgyum nyid
320a3(yum): kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dran pa nye bar
320a4(yum): gzhag pa nyid kyang sgrub sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags
320a5(yum): yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang sgyum sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gnan ma
320a6(yum): lags teng rdzu 'dul gyi rkang po nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gnanas
320a7(yum): lags te/ dang ngo po nyid kyang sgyu bsnam nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gnan ma lags te/ stobs
320a8(yum): byang rgyum sbyar nyid kyang sapas mas sa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan la rnams kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu 'ang gtson ma lags te/ byang chub kyi yan la
320b1(yum): ting kyang sna ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sa// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan pa lags/ smra bangagand pa lags
320b2(yum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyum sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gnanam
320b3(yum): lags sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyang
320b4(yum): gnan ma lags te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan
320b5(yum): ma lags te/ chad med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gnad pa lags/
320b6(yum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma skye ma nyid gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das
320b7(yum): par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa brgya nyid kyang sgyu ma sbyab nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das
320b8(yum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid sgyu ma sgyu ma
321a1(yum): nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i stoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang srod pa/
321a2(yum): med pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gnan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar
321a3(yum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// byang chubacom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan pa lags
321a4(yum): te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma
321a5(yum): lags te ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang sgyum sgyu ma nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang
321a6(yum): gzhan ma lags te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang sgyum sgyum nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gnan
321a7(yum): sa lags sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang sgyu sgyum nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// bco
321a8(yum): ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ba'ang gnan ma la sas/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sgyum sgyum nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams
321b1(yum): bcom ldan 'das so sa yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang sgyum smra ba nyid kyang /
321b2(yum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'ang gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ byams pa che po nyid kyang snu
321b3(yum): sgyu ba nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang snum sgyu ma nyid kya
321b4(yum): song rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ong gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sbyar/
321b5(yum): sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gnar ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rgyun tu
321b6(yum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang stum sgyu ma nyid kyang rgyun zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma 'angalags
321b7(yum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das phyir mi 'ong ba'i
321b8(yum): 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ phyir mi 'ong bo'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan
322a1(yum): 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyum nyid kyang dgra
322a2(yum): pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rang byang chuba'o/
322a3(yum): bcom ldan 'das lame gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang snum sgyu ma nyid kyang
322a4(yum): lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa thams cad
322a5(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyum snum nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji sam du sems/ sgyu ma 'a
322a6(yum): la skye ba'am/ 'jig pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de rdzas pa
322a7(yum): du sems sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
322a8(yum): yul dang raba'i byor de ji sam du sems bang la skye ba med cing 'gag med pa med pa dang / gtod mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa shes rab kyi
322b1(yum): du byed pa la slob par 'gyur rab/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcog
322b2(yum): ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang
322b3(yum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
322b4(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyis yin nam/ nye bar len pa'i
322b5(yum): phung po lnga po skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bco
322b6(yum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'dus shes med cing brda med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / bla snyed med pa dang / ming
322b7(yum): med pa dang ming du gdags pa med pa dang // lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gri las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi la
322b8(yum): med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing //
323a1(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
323a2(yum): drir mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing
323a3(yum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis jis
323a4(yum): gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sgyu r+ya'i skyes bus bsrabs pa ltar bu
323a5(yum): med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsrabs par bgyi'o// nga ci'i slad du ne no/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid skye ma'i skyes bur rig par
323a6(yum): ba sha stag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bsrabs shing / rnam pa
323a7(yum): rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slang du nem bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar drung po lnga po rnams
323a8(yum): da sa pam mchis pa bzhin te/ dngos pa ma mas pa'i ring bad de darigs su mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga'astsal pa/ rab kyi dngos du
323b1(yum): rmil pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bskyab shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ri mi 'gyur/
323b2(yum): de ci'i srad du nan/ bco ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmi li man dngos po mchis pa'i rang bzhin de/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su me mchis so//
323b3(yum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
323b4(yum): pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du ne na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang
323b5(yum): bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i
323b6(yum): phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi
323b7(yum): 'gyur ro/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis
323b8(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig yor lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsrabs shing / rnam pa thams
324a1(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
324a2(yum): mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin to/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
324a3(yum): deji snyam du sems/ chu zlalta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsrubs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/
324a4(yum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po med da ma
324a5(yum): pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ smyig rgyal bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol
324a6(yum): la sa sa / sa dpa khyen pa nyid du byung bar gyur du/ gsal pa/ ldan 'das don pa gyur ro// sa na/ bam
324a7(yum): 'dis 'di ra sdug rgya ni dngos por mchis pa'i rung bad te/ dngos par rgyas pa'i rang ba ni de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
324a8(yum): nga rab 'byor rje sam du sems/ sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po deng ga shes rab kyi pha rol du phyir ba la bslabs shing / rnam pa thangs cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
324b1(yum): bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i srad du nen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhid de ni
324b2(yum): dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsale pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'dri ltar gzugs ni rmi la m+b+ha bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lams bu/ 'du shes ni rmil pa lnga bu/
324b3(yum): 'du byed ni rmel pa lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa grang yid pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni dang song pa nyid kyi
324b4(yum): mi dmigs phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid/
324b5(yum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don ngos pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'du byas snod pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' la
324b6(yum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir
324b7(yum): mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
324b8(yum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzug
325a1(yum): ni sgyum lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgyum lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgyum lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgyum lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni bang
325a2(yum): po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// byinang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
325a3(yum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong
325a4(yum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmangs
325a5(yum): rang gi banan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa/
325a6(yum): da kyi lcer mi dmigs so// dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid sang pa nyid kyi phyir ming darigs so// dngos snang ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ming migs
325a7(yum): 'du 'byor gzugs ni sgra rnyan lA bu/ tshor ba ni sgra brnyan ltung/ 'du shes ni smya n+danas bu/ 'du byed ni sgo btsun lta bu/ rnam pa shes pa ni sde brgya la bu ste/ rnam par shes pabang /
325a8(yum): nga dor dbang po drug go// den phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// lho stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang song pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
325b1(yum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigasaso// chen pa sang pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs sa// 'du byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
325b2(yum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// tho ga ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa
325b3(yum): song pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
325b4(yum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong/
325b5(yum): pa nyid phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni mig yor lta bu/ tshor ba ni mi ga yor lta bu/ 'du shes ni mig yor lta bu/ 'du byed mig yor lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni migayor
325b6(yum): lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang srong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang song ba
325b7(yum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong /
325b8(yum): pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi
326a1(yum): ma da gams 'o pa nyid kyi maung migs so// rang bzhi snang pa nyid kyi khye ming dmigs sa// sa thangs sa
326a2(yum): kyi phyir mi da gso// rang gi mtshad nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa song pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa song pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
326a3(yum): nga bo nyi'id stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos pa med pa'i dro bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni n+ya zla la bu/ no ba'i mu rdul
326a4(yum): 'du shes ni chu zla la bu/ 'du byed ri chu zla lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu/ rnam par shes pa grang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// deng gni nang song pa
326a5(yum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po
326a6(yum): stong ba nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pastong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid kyi phyi
326a7(yum): dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ra mi dmigs so// thog dang tham med pastong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa snod pa nyi
326a8(yum): kyi nga mams/ rang shi dang cing kyi kyi ming sogasas mas mas thong pa nyid kyi khye ri rigs so// can da shing cing khyo
326b1(yum): ming rigs pa spong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa song pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir me dmigs so// dngos po
326b2(yum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs kyi ni spyog rgya la bu/ tshor ba ni spyig rgya la bu/ 'du shes ni skyigs bu/ 'du byed ni smrig rgya la du
326b3(yum): rnam par shes pa ni smyig lta bu/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang song ba nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nying
326b4(yum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi reng stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
326b5(yum): don dam pa song pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das
326b6(yum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// zlog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong ba nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin
326b7(yum): pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad mkhye stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
326b8(yum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rkye mi dmigs
327a1(yum): dasom pa bco ldan 'das de lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'cher po khrig pa lags dang zhugs pas bsu pa thos na/ 'dzams
327a2(yum): she bdang / blag par 'gyur labs rga btsa 'dungs kyis 'phrul/ rab byor gal byang chub sems dpa' sengs dpa chen pathig la las du sa
327a3(yum): pa'ang yin la/ gis rab kyi byin pa lathabs mi mkhas pa ni ge ste/ dge pa'i bshes gnyedan kyilag tu'angam 'ong na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag par yang 'gyur ro// khamam pa
327a4(yum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi snang mi skrag pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lathabs mkhas pa da gang lan
327a5(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa'i
327a6(yum): dang ldan po'i sems kyis/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// tshor ba mertag ces bya bar rtog sa mi dmigs so// 'du shes mi ga ces bya bar ga sa
327a7(yum): mi dmigs so// 'du byed mertag ces bya bar rtog sa de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa mi nag ces bya bar rtog se de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa
327a8(yum): sems dpa' chen po gos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngo gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
327b1(yum): ngal spyod pa'ichi/ dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dung ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs sug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog steng mi dmigs so// ra bsdug bsngal zhes bya bar/
327b2(yum): rtog ste mi dmigs so// 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog se de mi dmigs so// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog sa de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa sdug
327b3(yum): bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//
327b4(yum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhesab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs
327b5(yum): bdag med ces bya ba rdzogs mi rigasas// nor ba bdag med ces bya bar rtog ser mi dmigs so// 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar rtog sa ri dmigs so// 'du byed bdag
327b6(yum): med ces bya bar rdzog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
327b7(yum): rang kyi rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gas rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la stong pa'iH/
327b8(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs ni zhes bya bar rdzog steng mi dmigs so// tshor ba ni zhes bya bar rtog se de mi migs so// 'du shes ni nas
328a1(yum): khyab rtog se mi dmigs so// 'du byed ni ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa shes pa ni zhes byab rgyog se ri dmigs sa
328a2(yum): rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' se
328a3(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so/
328a4(yum): dor bsod nas bya bar dag ste mi dmigs so// 'du shes song zhes bya bar rtog sa dro dmigs so// 'du byed sa de zhes bya bar rtog sa mang migs so// rnam
328a5(yum): thams cad shes pa sod bya bar rtog sa de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'din byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabasam
328a6(yum): 'o/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rabakyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
328a7(yum): rjes badzugs pa rjes bya ba ga seng mi dmigs so// rnam pa rnams cadam khyen pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ khyo mtshan pa med ces byab
328a8(yum): ri rigs so// ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'dugs macanam mad ces bya bar rtags mi dmigs so// ma thams
328b1(yum): cad mkhyen nga nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog sa de mi dmigs so// rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldang pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par
328b2(yum): shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog sa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mal
328b3(yum): pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
328b4(yum): kyis/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtogs ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar rtog
328b5(yum): ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
328b6(yum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed sdon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam pa rnams
328b7(yum): shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs
328b8(yum): mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
329a1(yum): pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mngon par 'dra bya ba med ces bya bar rtog sa de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
329a2(yum): kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes mngon par 'du
329a3(yum): ba med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog sde ming
329a4(yum): song rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'din
329a5(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshesabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
329a6(yum): chen dgas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog se me migs
329a7(yum): rnam mams cad na ldan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba dbe zhes bya bdurtag snang mi dmigs so// rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
329a8(yum): kyis 'du shes dben zhes bya bar rtog snyed mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar rtog sa ma
329b1(yum): dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rdzog se mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'dir byang chub sengs
329b2(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
329b3(yum): ngogs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byas gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de mi dmigs so
329b4(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
329b5(yum): 'du shes mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi
329b6(yum): dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang
329b7(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
329b8(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam
330a1(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
330a2(yum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du

330a4(yum): rtog pad+ma de de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gnan yang
330a5(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs bdag
330a6(yum): rjod ba'i rnam par rtog par rnyed mi dmigs so// dam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid dang ldang po'i yid la bya bas tsho ba bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed du ma
330a7(yum): so rnam tharnams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bru bas 'ju shes bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa
330a8(yum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de da mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam pa
330b1(yum): zhes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong
330b2(yum): pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad pakhyod pa
330b3(yum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs ni ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba ni ba'i rnam
330b4(yum): par rtog par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas 'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa
330b5(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya

330b7(yum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams

331a2(yum): 'a chog par byed de ming migs so// rnam parnams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed srong pa'i rna par rtog par byed de do mi dmigasas

331a6(yum): dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa \u0f7f/

331b1(yum): pa tshan pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la spyod pa

332b4(yum): sems dpa' chen po du ltar rtog pa de 'di snyam du skye byas te/ sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// gzugs
332b5(yum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rimi dmigos pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos son to// gzugs ni zhes
332b6(yum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// gzugs song zhes bya bar de mi dmigs kyis chos son to// gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar dri mi migs
