334a1(yum): chos ston to// rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston thosam mo// rab 'byor 'di byang chub sems dpal
334a2(yum): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por mi 'jigs mi snang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gan
334a3(yum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs
334a4(yum): gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang sas
334a5(yum): bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldar pas/ gzugs gang stsa
334a6(yum): bdas med pa'i rnam par me la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yong la byed // nyad thos dang nga sangs rgyas kyi yongs bya ba dang na pas gzugs pa /
334a7(yum): ba rnam par yid 'byed pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis da la byed do// nyan thos dngang sangs rgyas kyi ring la bya ba dang mi 'anu bas/ gzugs gang sring pa
334a8(yum): par ying la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mtshan ma med pa
334b1(yum): rnam par yid la byed par mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang snad pa red
334b2(yum): ba'i rnam par yi la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas gzugs gang mngon pa
334b3(yum): bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ying la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs
334b4(yum): gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor ba gang mi rtag
334b5(yum): pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor ba gang sdug bsngal
334b6(yum): ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor ba gang bang gi med pa'i
334b7(yum): rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor gang ni ba'i rnam par yid
334b8(yum): la byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor ba gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de ni
335a1(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi po ldan pas tshor ba gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam
335a2(yum): par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas cho grang smon pa med pa'i rnam par mi
335a3(yum): la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor ba gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par ring
335a4(yum): la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor ba gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa
335a5(yum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// 'ad gyis dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yi la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du shes gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de ming dmigs
335a6(yum): tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du shes gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par ying la byed pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul
335a7(yum): skyes padil byed // nyan rdzas dang d+has sA rgyas kyi yangal bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du shes gang bdag med pa'i rnam par 'de la byed pa de mi migs pa'i tshul rgyas
335a8(yum): 'des byed do// nyan thos dpang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan pas 'dre shes gang ni nga'i rnam par ying la byed pa de med pe dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'ang sa byed pa/
335b1(yum): mas dang ngas sa rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldang pas 'du shes pang 'od pa'i rnam dar ying la byed pa de snyi dmigs pa'i rdul gyis pa laphreng // mdzes ra
335b2(yum): sangs rgyas kyis yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du shes gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed de// nyan thos dang
335b3(yum): sangs rgyas kyis yid la bye ba dang mi ldan pas 'du shes gang smod pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs
335b4(yum): rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du shes gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang
335b5(yum): sangs rgyas kyi yod la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'dra shes gang dben po'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rangasangs
335b6(yum): rgyas yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du byed gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba
335b7(yum): dang mi ldan pas 'du byed gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed bya ba mi ldan
335b8(yum): pas 'du byed gang bdag med po'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan
336a1(yum): bas 'ang byed gang ni pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid byed do// nyan thos dang rangs sa rgyas kyi yid la byu
336a2(yum): dang mi ldan pas 'du byed gang stong po'i rnam par yid la byed pa de de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi
336a3(yum): ldan pas 'du byed gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang
336a4(yum): mi ldan pas 'du byed gang smod pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang
336a5(yum): mi ldan pas 'du byed gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nga
336a6(yum): labya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du byed gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
336a7(yum): 'bye ba dang mi ldan pas rnam pa dgas pa gang mi rtag pa'i yid la byed pa de mau dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la
336a8(yum): ba dang mi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgya
336b1(yum): kyi yi la bya ba dang mi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos pa ngas
336b2(yum): rgyas kyi ying la bya ba dang ma ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang ni ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ yang thos dang rang sangs rgyas
336b3(yum): kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang stong pa'i rnam pa yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
336b4(yum): yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs
336b5(yum): rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang yin smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos
336b6(yum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//
336b7(yum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang mngon dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//
336b8(yum): rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
337a1(yum): dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs pa sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi
337a2(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i ma pa dang / nai ba'i rnam pa dang
337a3(yum): sdong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rnag
337a4(yum): par byed pa de dang bzod pa mos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
337a5(yum): dngu' chen po mi 'jigs mi snang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snang
337a6(yum): pa'irnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// da
337a7(yum): mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu nag go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
337a8(yum): pazhid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs bdag med ces bya bar da mi rigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i
337b1(yum): 'di 'a byabs gzugs ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs sang
337b2(yum): zhes pa per dmi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byangs gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar
337b3(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs spong po med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu/
337b4(yum): rtogs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtogs so
337b5(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtogs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyed
337b6(yum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
337b7(yum): tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bas tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
337b8(yum): bya bas tshor ba bdag med ces ce bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar
338a1(yum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rdzog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor bstod shes bya bar nge
338a2(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
338a3(yum): rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam
338a4(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams
338a5(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba dper zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab du rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i/
338a6(yum): yid la bya bas 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyir brtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes sus
338a7(yum): bsngal nas bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la byas 'dre shes bdag med ces bya bar ngom
338a8(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ra
338b1(yum): gso/ rnam thams cad ma khyed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidi la bya bas 'du shes song ces bya bar de mi migs pa'i tshul cis rab tu ga go// ma pas
338b2(yum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
338b3(yum): pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes
338b4(yum): mngon pa 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes dben nas
338b5(yum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
338b6(yum): rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'angadu byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa
338b7(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar do mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
338b8(yum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'angadu byed ni zhes bya bar de ming dmi gos pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed/
339a1(yum): song zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mtshar ma med
339a2(yum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa
339a3(yum): tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
339a4(yum): rtog go rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad
339a5(yum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
339a6(yum): nga'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
339a7(yum): byangs rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar demi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par
339a8(yum): shes bzhin bya bar de'i dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtogasas// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam pa shes pa rgya de zhes bya bar de /
339b1(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa ma thun ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
339b2(yum): gyis rab tu rtag go// rnam pa thams cad pakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa sngod pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tudag nga
339b3(yum): rnam grangs cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mngon du par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa
339b4(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// de ltar de dag la rnam pa thams
339b5(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byas mi gtong zhing / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
339b6(yum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mo 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
339b7(yum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
339b8(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyi rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi
340a1(yum): 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
340a2(yum): nga'i yid la bya bas gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge
340a3(yum): ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gnan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ nas
340a4(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs
340a5(yum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi'i byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
340a6(yum): chen pogs rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
340a7(yum): kyis nog cing / na thos dang ras surbAs dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gnan gyi ga ma 'byed pa dang /
340a8(yum): byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa chen ngogs rab kyi rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/ dam rnapa pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la bya bas gzugs
340b1(yum): song zhes bya bar yid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge bla ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs
340b2(yum): su 'gyur ba gnan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stong ba'iche/ nam rnam pa thams cad
340b3(yum): bakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldang ma
340b4(yum): yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi mi go pa'i byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
340b5(yum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi rtog cing /
340b6(yum): nyan thos da rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems
340b7(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mngon par 'du bya
340b8(yum): med ces/ bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs
341a1(yum): su 'gyur ba gnan gyi go mo'i byed pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
341a2(yum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
341a3(yum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gas
341a4(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ni/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tsho ba merta ge ces bya bar de mi
341a5(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi ldan dgo bdo ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gnan
341a6(yum): kyi go 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi rol tu phyid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
341a7(yum): ldan pa'i phod la byas tshor bsdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge
341a8(yum): ni yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis so ma'i byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen gas rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la
341b1(yum): spong ba'i dpa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'id dang lda pa'i ying la bya bas tshor bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul ces rtog cing / nya thos dang
341b2(yum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gnan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem
341b3(yum): dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
341b4(yum): rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /
341b5(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor
341b6(yum): bstong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs
341b7(yum): su 'gyur ba gnar gyi go ma'i byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i// nam rnam pa thams
341b8(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
342a1(yum): yid la bya ba dang mi dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs 'gyur ba gnan gyi go ma'i byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
342a2(yum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar mi
342a3(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ming ge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gan
342a4(yum): gyi go ma'i byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lda/
342a5(yum): pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
342a6(yum): bya ba dang mi dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gan gyi gonga'i'adrung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' se sadapa' chen po gas rab kyi
342a7(yum): ril tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba dben ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnying /
342a8(yum): na thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gnan gyi go mi 'dred pa dang / byang chub
342b1(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes
342b2(yum): rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi dge
342b3(yum): su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
342b4(yum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
342b5(yum): ba'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
342b6(yum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar mi dmigs
342b7(yum): ba'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gan
342b8(yum): gyi go mi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
343a1(yum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
343a2(yum): yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur gzhan gyi go 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol dubyin
343a3(yum): pa la spyod pa'i che/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes song zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /
343a4(yum): zos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
343a5(yum): dasems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ rapa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mtshan ma med ces
343a6(yum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog rjong / nya thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ming ge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba/
343a7(yum): gan myi ga pa'i bye pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam ma pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid
343a8(yum): ldan pa'i yid la bye bas 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bdang
343b1(yum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gnan gyi go mi 'byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas/
343b2(yum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnyog cing / nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
343b3(yum): tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gnan gyi go mi 'byed/
343b4(yum): bdang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gi serab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
343b5(yum): byabs 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ming dge ba de ma yin
343b6(yum): ba byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur gnan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
343b7(yum): pasdams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mi rtog ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang lda
343b8(yum): nga'i yid la bya ba'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
344a1(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed sdug bsngal
344a2(yum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dag ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba san/
344a3(yum): gya go mi'i byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
344a4(yum): yid la bya bas 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge
344a5(yum): de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur gnan gyi go pa'i byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyo
344a6(yum): 'icheng dam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang
344a7(yum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byu ba dang mi dge bded ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gnan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems da
344a8(yum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ni/ dam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed srong zhes bya ba /
344b1(yum): darigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i yid la mi dge ba de ma yid pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur
344b2(yum): braganan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bra la skyong bu'i chi/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
344b3(yum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
344b4(yum): bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
344b5(yum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed smon parjes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing /
344b6(yum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma'i byed pa dang / byang chub sems
344b7(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mngon
344b8(yum): khar 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
345a1(yum): #/ bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
345a2(yum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed dben nas bya
345a3(yum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur
345a4(yum): gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lda
345a5(yum): ba'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang me
345a6(yum): ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go m+bi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu byan
345a7(yum): lastod pa'i tshe/ marnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi sa zla bas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa rdzas
345a8(yum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyigo mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub
345b1(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' ldan gnas ran kyi pha ral du phyin pa la byung pa'am/ nam rnam pa thams cad ma ldan pa nyid dang ldan pa
345b2(yum): shes pa bdag med ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ming ge ba de ma min bzung chub
345b3(yum): kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa rnam
345b4(yum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 'di yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigasa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
345b5(yum): ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pon pa rab kyi pha rol tu can
345b6(yum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bras rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing
345b7(yum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems
345b8(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mtshan ma
346a1(yum): med ces par de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bas
346a2(yum): su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/
346a3(yum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
346a4(yum): dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
346a5(yum): la spyod pa'i che/ sa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa cho//
346a6(yum): cidang nyan thos dang rang rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dang
346a7(yum): sems dpa' tshan pazhes rab kyi pha rol tu ldan pa la stong pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par gas pa chemanas
346a8(yum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi nom
346b1(yum): 'byed pa'i ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por mi 'dzin
346b2(yum): ma snang skrag par ma 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shir rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nem rnam pa thams
346b3(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi gzugs nyid kyang stong pa
346b4(yum): do/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'i 'du shes kyi stong pa
346b5(yum): nyid kyis 'du shes spong ba ma yin gyi 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi
346b6(yum): 'du byed stod pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa song ba ma min gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
346b7(yum): pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mig go/ rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis
346b8(yum): stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna'i stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yid kyi/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyi
347a1(yum): kyang sna'o// lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus
347a2(yum): stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
347a3(yum): kyang yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra'i stong pa nyid kyi
347a4(yum): sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// dri'i stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
347a5(yum): ra'i stong pa nyid kyis snod pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg gi sbyong pa nyid reg sbyong ba ma yin gyi/ reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang /
347a6(yum): chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig
347a7(yum): gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes
347a8(yum): bya'i stong pa nyid kyis rna pa'i rnam par shes pa spong ba ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa cid nga// stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa'i slar shes pa'o//
347b1(yum): na'i rnam par shes pab snang ba cad kyis sgra'i rnam par shes pa snang ba ma yin gyi/ rtswa'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyar snang ba nyidang // stong pa nyid song sna
347b2(yum): par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
347b3(yum): kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa
347b4(yum): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin
347b5(yum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus
347b6(yum): te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
347b7(yum): stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o//
347b8(yum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus
348a1(yum): te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid du/
348a2(yum): stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te
348a3(yum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyis 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma
348a4(yum): yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
348a5(yum): stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid do// stong pa
348a6(yum): nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
348a7(yum): rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
348a8(yum): kyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chen pa'i ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin
348b1(yum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sgra'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen tshur ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
348b2(yum): tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
348b3(yum): pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
348b4(yum): stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o//
348b5(yum): yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
348b6(yum): tshor ba nyid kyis stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis sa'i khams stong pa ma yin
348b7(yum): gyi/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyis chu'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ chu'i khams nyid
348b8(yum): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis me'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/
349a1(yum): stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis rlung gyi khams stong ba ma yin gyi/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa
349a2(yum): spyong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams song ba ma yin gyi/ nam mkha'i khams rnyed kyang
349a3(yum): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis snga rnam par shes pa'i khams stong ba ma yin
349a4(yum): rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis ma rig pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ ma ri//
349a5(yum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyi 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong/
349a6(yum): pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kya
349a7(yum): rnam par shes po shes pa'o// maung dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis ming dang gzugs stong ba ma yin gyi/ ming dang gzugs cid kyang snang ba nyid do/
349a8(yum): stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid kyis skye mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
349b1(yum): song pa nyid kyang skye mched drug na// reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis reg pa stong pa ma yin te/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// ra
349b2(yum): ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sred pa stong pa ma
349b3(yum): yid kyi/ sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa'i sdong pa nyid kyis len pa stong pa ma yin gyi// len pa nyid kyang spyong pa nyi
349b4(yum): do// stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa'i stong pa nyid kyis srid pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// skye
349b5(yum): ba'i stong pa nyid kyis skye ba stong pa ma yid kyi/ skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi'i stong pa nyid kyis rga shi stong pa ma yin
349b6(yum): gyi rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin
349b7(yum): byedasbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa'i
349b8(yum): kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi
350a1(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bzod
350a2(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis ston
350a3(yum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par
350a4(yum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong
350a5(yum): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snang
350a6(yum): pa ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang snang ba rgyad kyi snang
350a7(yum): nyid kyis nang snang ba nyid stong ngam yin gyi/ nang stong pa nyid kyang stod pa nyid do// stong pa nyid gdunang stong pa ni da// hUM stong pa nyid kyi stong pa skyed
350a8(yum): stong ba ma yin gyi/ bye stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang kyi stong panyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid stong
350b1(yum): na/ phrinang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid // snang pa tshad kyang bla n+ya snang ba nyid do// snad pa nyid stong pa nyid pa snad pa rnyed gas stong pa nyid kyang
350b2(yum): sbyong ba ma yin gyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis chen
350b3(yum): stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dram
350b4(yum): pastong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis
350b5(yum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong ma yin gyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus
350b6(yum): mi byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'dus stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma
350b7(yum): rgyas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ mtha' las la
350b8(yum): pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis
351a1(yum): stong pa nyid kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang spyong pa nyid do// stong
351a2(yum): pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dor ba med pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ dor ba med pa stong pa
351a3(yum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi
351a4(yum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos thams cad stong
351a5(yum): pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/
351a6(yum): da mamatshan nyid snang ba rnyed snang pa ma yin no// rang giman na nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong ba nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang gi ma nyan nyid stong ba nyid do//

351b1(yum): stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
351b2(yum): stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spyong pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong ba ma yin gyi// dngos
351b3(yum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i rdo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye ba
351b4(yum): gzhag pa rnams spong ba ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba
351b5(yum): stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa ma yin gyi yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phru/
351b6(yum): gyi rkang pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams//
351b7(yum): so/ dbang po'i stong pa nyid kyis dbang po rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs kyi stong pa nyid
351b8(yum): kyis stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag kyi stong pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi yan las
352a1(yum): rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam
352a2(yum): yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa rtse
352a3(yum): gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid
352a4(yum): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gan ta gyi stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan nyid
352a5(yum): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// chang med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis tshad med pa rnams stod pa ma yin gyi/ chad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
352a6(yum): stong pa nyid kyang chad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i stong pa nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/
352a7(yum): zus sa med pa'i rnams par 'jug pa'i spyod gang stong panyid do// stong po nyid kyang gzug pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa rnams pa// rnams par thar ba
352a8(yum): ngabacad kyi rnam pa ya rnams par rlo ma ni sa pa // sacang kyang rnam 'am rnams rgyam
352b1(yum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid
352b2(yum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa
352b3(yum): stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon
352b4(yum): pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis
352b5(yum): mngon par shes pa rnam stong pa ma yin gyi/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin gyi stong pa nyid/
352b6(yum): kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid kyis
352b7(yum): gzungs kyis sgo rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
352b8(yum): kyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin
353a1(yum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kya
353a2(yum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang migs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ so so yang
353a3(yum): dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis byams pa chen po stong pa
353a4(yum): ma yin gyi/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// sring rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis snying rje chen po stong pa ma yin gyi
353a5(yum): snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen ze'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas rgyas ma 'dres
353a6(yum): rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'a
353a7(yum): 'dzi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
353a8(yum): ram kyi pa tu phyin pa la spang ba'i thabs mkhas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa mi sems dpa' can ldan paman
353b1(yum): mi 'jigs mi sdung skrag par mi 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snang phrag brgya pa/ dum bug kyi sa/ bam po bzhi bcun gardzun pa/
353b2(yum): ba 'byor gyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
353b3(yum): tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
353b4(yum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gshe na ni/ gang de la/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
353b5(yum): chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thabs cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
353b6(yum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
353b7(yum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
353b8(yum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su/
354a1(yum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kya
354a2(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyam thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mi
354a3(yum): rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
354a4(yum): sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'dri ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes pa
354a5(yum): du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya
354a6(yum): ber de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sa
354a7(yum): rgyas kyis yongs su sngar mi 'dug pa'o// gang de la sbyor ba sdug pasngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul chos ston cing / dge bzhin pa thams cad kyang
354a8(yum): rnam pa mams cad mkhyen pa cing mardzogs par/ can thos kyi ma'i ma nga sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs sa sngor mi 'jug pa sa/ nga de la 'dugs sdus bsngal zhes

354b3(yum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes

354b5(yum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sare yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen

361a7(yum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'i
361a8(yum): btags pa ma thas kyis 'am sangs sa kyis yongs su su sa 'jas pa'o// gang de la med byed gyis bya bar mi migs pa'i tshul gyi
361b1(yum): dag pa na pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par can rdzas kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su su ma 'jug dag/
361b2(yum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
361b3(yum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
361b4(yum): pa'o// gang de la rna ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma ga
361b5(yum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
361b6(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de/
361b7(yum): la lce mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
361b8(yum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
362a1(yum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug par/
362a2(yum): gang de la yid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par1
362a3(yum): thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i shes gnyenan/
362a4(yum): gang de la mig smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rgyu thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtugs
362a5(yum): par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su sngor mo 'jug pa'o// gang de lan basmon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ldan
362a6(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'dug pa'o//
362a7(yum): gang de la sgra smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtogs

362b3(yum): thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
362b4(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi 'jug pa'o// rab
362b5(yum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig mngon par 'du bya ba ru de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
362b6(yum): gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su spo

362b8(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mngon par 'du bya ba med/

363a4(yum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul rgyas chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams ca

363a7(yum): gtog 'o ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i da
363a8(yum): shes garten ni/ klung de la mig dbyen gyis bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rna ba thams cad kyang rnam pa rnams

368b8(yum): gang de la chos mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

382a8(yum): sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa 'i

382b4(yum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa tham

382b8(yum): gshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gis 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams

388a4(yum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa

388a7(yum): sang+yas rgyas kyi sar yongs su snga mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan sang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bzhes gnyen ni/ gang del skye

388b2(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyis
388b3(yum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham

388b7(yum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
388b8(yum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
389a1(yum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par 'a thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab
389a2(yum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
389a3(yum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
389a4(yum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
389a5(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu ba bdag med
389a6(yum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'ams
389a7(yum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos ston cing /
389a8(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de/
389b1(yum): ma man gyi ma rnal / khyen ma ma ngas med ces pa bya tshemi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad cang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
389b2(yum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
389b3(yum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa
389b4(yum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i chu
389b5(yum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
389b6(yum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mekhyen pa
389b7(yum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
389b8(yum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
390a1(yum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
390a2(yum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams /
390a3(yum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyin ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bam gtan gyi
390a4(yum): tu phyin pa ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan //
390a5(yum): kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
390a6(yum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug
390a7(yum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myung zhes bya ba
390a8(yum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sang
390b1(yum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba
390b2(yum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de/
390b3(yum): la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad ma
390b4(yum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bcon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong //
390b5(yum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
390b6(yum): kyi sa 'am/ sang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
390b7(yum): tshul gyis chos cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
390b8(yum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dag
391a1(yum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
391a2(yum): pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan
391a3(yum): ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
391a4(yum): thas kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de med
391a5(yum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyidam gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
391a6(yum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
391a7(yum): dge ba'i na po sems padu ga rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mig togs par can thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar mongs su gyu
391a8(yum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar dme dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sbyin cing / rigs
391b1(yum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
