391b3(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha
391b4(yum): rol tu phyin mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
391b5(yum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su spong mi 'jug pa'o/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
391b6(yum): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing //
391b7(yum): dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
391b8(yum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smin pa med ces bya bar de med mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
392a1(yum): pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
392a2(yum): gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
392a3(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu/
392a4(yum): phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtonas
392a5(yum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya ba/
392a6(yum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis phyin pa
392a7(yum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smyon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis kyis ston cing / dge pa'i dra ba thams cadakyang
392a8(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis ra yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang /
392b1(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
392b2(yum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
392b3(yum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
392b4(yum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ba
392b5(yum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya bar meb ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa tham cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
392b6(yum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya
392b7(yum): ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
392b8(yum): kyi sa 'am rang sang rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
393a1(yum): tshe don cing / dge ba'i na brnam cad kyang rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par tan thom gyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
393a2(yum): gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya bar med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
393a3(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems da /
393a4(yum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnye ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kya /
393a5(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
393a6(yum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
393a7(yum): rang sangs rgyas kyis yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/
393a8(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtags par can tham kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sngo mi 'dug pa'o// gang sa
393b1(yum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin dben zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa nyan
393b2(yum): kyi sa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ci
393b3(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
393b4(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog par nyan thos
393b5(yum): sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnye ni/ gang de la nang sna
393b6(yum): pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
393b7(yum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ce bya bar de mi dmig pa'i tshul gyi chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham
393b8(yum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar
394a1(yum): // de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyan
394a2(yum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
394a3(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
394a4(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
394a5(yum): sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye
394a6(yum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa
394a7(yum): tshul gyis chos spyan cing/ dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cid ma gtogs par nyam thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su su ma
394a8(yum): gang de la 'dus stong pa nyid mi rtapa ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid ma 'a sa
394b1(yum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de sa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
394b2(yum): ston cing / rnam dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'amarang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo mi 'jug pa'o//
394b3(yum): de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma ga
394b4(yum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stom
394b5(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang nges
394b6(yum): bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
394b7(yum): kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
394b8(yum): pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams
395a1(yum): da pa ci mi ces bya ba de mi migs pa dzum gyis rgyas sun ci/ dge ba'i thams sa ca rnam pa rnams cangs byed kyi sa bdugs pa na rjes kyis
395a2(yum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tha
395a3(yum): kyang ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag
395a4(yum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
395a5(yum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
395a6(yum): rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa 'i ma gtogs par byin thos kyi sa 'am 'ang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// bang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba
395a7(yum): migs pa'i rdus gyis rgyas su tshad/ dge ba tha thams cad kyang sa pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma pa sas pa na rjes kyis la grangs sa rgyas kyis ma mangs
395a8(yum): slar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dnges pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
395b1(yum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge
395b2(yum): bzhes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa med ces bya bar ngo mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma ga/
395b3(yum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// yang de la phyi'i stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
395b4(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyin
395b5(yum): stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
395b6(yum): kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba
395b7(yum): pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyi
395b8(yum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi 'am
396a1(yum): sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba
396a2(yum): pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa
396a3(yum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
396a4(yum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
396a5(yum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
396a6(yum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
396a7(yum): ngas rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang des thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul kyis rnam
396a8(yum): dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ma gtogs pa can thos kyi sa 'ami rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// yang des
396b1(yum): da pa med pa stong pa nyid la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
396b2(yum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
396b3(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams
396b4(yum): cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
396b5(yum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
396b6(yum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong
396b7(yum): pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
396b8(yum): 'amarang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
397a1(yum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su sngar mi 'jug pa'o// yang de la ngo ba nyid stsas
397a2(yum): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
397a3(yum): kyisar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
397a4(yum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi zung sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
397a5(yum): dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
397a6(yum): rnams cad mkhyen pa rjid ma gtogs par nyathas kyis 'am dang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo mi 'jug pa'o// gang des phyi stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de med
397a7(yum): chus gyis rgyas sun cing/ dge ba'i ma pa rnams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa gying ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su
397a8(yum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
397b1(yum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshum
397b2(yum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/
397b3(yum): gang de la chen po stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranya
397b4(yum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
397b5(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang des
397b6(yum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma ga
397b7(yum): par 'an thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
397b8(yum): ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha
398a1(yum): kha/ las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par

398a4(yum): stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa la
398a5(yum): rangs sa rgyas kyis yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
398a6(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya/
398a7(yum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yod/
398a8(yum): su sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos skyon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams ca
398a9(yum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gnyiyas par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi min/

398b5(yum): gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
398b6(yum): pa nyid ma gtogs par 'amathos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngar mi 'dug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rten pa'i
398b7(yum): pa'i bzhes pa rten na// yang de la nang stong ba nyid ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i rjes gyis rjes mtshang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyem pa nyid mams
398b8(yum): par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gyi stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos snyan cing / dge ba
398b9(yum): pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyis
399a1(yum): pa ba ma migs pa lam rgya bsnu pa dge lams sa kya sa ma pa sa byed pa'i pa gas pa tsun thos rgyal/
399a2(yum): 'ang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo mi 'jug pa'o// gang des stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshus kyis chos ston rdzong/ dge ba'i gams/
399a3(yum): kyang rnam pa rnams ca mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par can thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su su mi 'jug pa'o// yang de lachen po snang pa nyid gi zhes/
399a4(yum): pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stan ci/ dge ba'i rtsa pathams cad kyang u pa thams cad mkhyen pa kyi ma gcags par 'an thos kyis 'da'angs sa
399a5(yum): yang yongs su sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
399a6(yum): rnams pad ma khyed pa snyed ma gtags par rnya thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su snga mo 'dus pa'o// gang des 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni zhes bya ba
399a7(yum): mi dmigs pa rgyas kyis sa thong / bathams cag ma pa thams sa khyen pa cid ma gartags par rgyun gyis kyis 'am nga sangs rgyas kyis la
399a8(yum): / sa zlab med mas pa sa ma pa sa pa As kyang ma rnas
399a9(yum): sa ma kyipa yosas ma 'a lal gsas masas sam nga zhes bya pa me ma

400a8(yum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par ldan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar

401b1(yum): ma gags par gan rdzas kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin snang ba srid zung nas bya ba nga po tshu
401b2(yum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis

401b4(yum): cad kyang rnam pa thams ca mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gim

402a1(yum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'gyu
402a2(yum): pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos rnying / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad/
402a3(yum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i rnga za cid sa
402a4(yum): stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa'i thams cad kyang rnam pa thams na mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
402a5(yum): na thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
402a6(yum): ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med pa ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
402a7(yum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'amar ba sangs rgyas kyir yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gyi stong ba
402a8(yum): mtshan med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i phul gyis chos stor cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnab pa thams cid mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa
402b1(yum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid sa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
402b2(yum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
402b3(yum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
402b4(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa
402b5(yum): gang de la chen po stong pa nying mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
402b6(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid
402b7(yum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
402b8(yum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de ma/
403a1(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
403a2(yum): kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa
403a3(yum): rdul gyis chos smyon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
403a4(yum): yongs su ma sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
403a5(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
403a6(yum): pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma zad ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyisas son cing / dge ba'i na
403a7(yum): rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid mA gtogs par snam thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
403a8(yum): dor ba med bsang bgyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar ri ma migs pa'i tshul gyis tsam bu cing / dge pa'i rtse bathams cad kyang rnam pa
403b1(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin du
403b2(yum): pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
403b3(yum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid
403b4(yum): mtshan med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis smon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
403b5(yum): nyan thos kyi sa 'ab rang sangs rgyas kyi slar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan med ces bya bar
403b6(yum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
403b7(yum): sa 'am radwa sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
403b8(yum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sa
404a1(yum): rgyas kyi sngar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
404a2(yum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
404a3(yum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med pa ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
404a4(yum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i
404a5(yum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
404a6(yum): gtogs par palan thos kyi sa 'am sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i /
404a7(yum): nga'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam/
404a8(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid smon pa med ces/
404b1(yum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos snyan cing / dge ba'i rtsapa rnams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par ldan thos kyis
404b2(yum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sems stom cing
404b3(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
404b4(yum): gang de la stong pa nyid smod pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
404b5(yum): bcid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am spangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de
404b6(yum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'amar
404b7(yum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
404b8(yum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
405a1(yum): 'dug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sun cing / dge ba'i rtsab thams/
405a2(yum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par kun gyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas song ba
405a3(yum): sman pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtsigs par can
405a4(yum): kyisa'am rang sangs kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'juga'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
405a5(yum): skor cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtsams par can rjes kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa 'o/
405a6(yum): gad de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kying rnam pa thams
405a7(yum): panyid ma gtogs par can zas kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid min pa med ces bya ba

405b2(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi slar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid ston pa med ces bya bar de ma

410a1(yum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa
410a2(yum): gang de la rdo ba nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dbigs pa'i tshul gyis sa ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang dab pa thams cad mkhyen pa
410a3(yum): ma gcogs par ldan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngang mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po meng pa'i rdo rje cing stong pa nyid dben zhes
410a4(yum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'irtsab thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am
410a5(yum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'dug pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa stong phrag brgya pa dum zug cipa/
410a6(yum): bam po bzhi bcu drug pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen na
410a7(yum): gang de la dran pa kyi bar bdag pa rnams pa rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgyas sod cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
410a8(yum): mkhyer pa kyid ma gartags par byamathos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su spong ba 'jug pa'o// gang ra ladran pa cing bcas pa rnams rdzus
410b1(yum): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
410b2(yum): kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su spong mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
410b3(yum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su so
410b4(yum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la drad pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
410b5(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhan
410b6(yum): parnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stod cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
410b7(yum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
410b8(yum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
411a1(yum): / pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ston pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
411a2(yum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa
411a3(yum): ge bar bzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
411a4(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
411a5(yum): rnams dben shes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gco
411a6(yum): ban nas kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi par yongs su zang mi 'ag pal// gang deg rdu pa med banag pa rnams na pa ngan gyur de mi mas
411a7(yum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
411a8(yum): sar yongs su sngar mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chul sems dpa' sems dpa' cher pa'i dge 'i'i ma shes namanani/ gang ngolas
411b1(yum): dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
411b2(yum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes

411b4(yum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par song ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos s+ho/

417b1(yum): de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa na smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
417b2(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan
417b3(yum): lag brgyad pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad ma
417b4(yum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
417b5(yum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
417b6(yum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i
417b7(yum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
417b8(yum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston tong /
418a1(yum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par can rjes kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor mas
418a2(yum): pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna thams cad kyang rnam pa
418a3(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa ljid pa gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams pa/
418a4(yum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
418a5(yum): sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sangs su su da mi 'dun pa'o// nga dal 'phags pa 'de brnams de nas bya rang me dmigs pa'i rdul gyis ma na
418a6(yum): dge pa'i cha ba rnams ca kyang rnam pa rnams ma than pa cid pa gtugs par kyis kyis 'am rangs ngas rgyas kyisar yongs su meng mi 'du
418a7(yum): gdu la 'phags pa'i bangan pa rnams cang shes rgya ba mi dpogs pa'i rdus rgya ma ldan cing / dge pa'i nga tharnamasas kya ma pa thams
418a8(yum): bgyi pa ga gas par sa kyis ma sa rgyas kyis sangs su mang mo 'phrul pa lo// la mas pa mad pa rnams sa ma

418b2(yum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smod pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

424b4(yum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med dang smon pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
424b5(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam pa thar pa'i dpe sgo stong pa nyid
424b6(yum): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
424b7(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su stor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
424b8(yum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
425a1(yum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am skar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang ma
425a2(yum): ma med pa dzin pa med pa mang par 'du bya ba ma ces bya badzi bang migs pa'i tshul gyis chos cing/ dge pa'i rtsa bathams cad kyang ma /
425a3(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i ste snga
425a4(yum): pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stom ning / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thar
425a5(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs gcan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa tsha
425a6(yum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sachos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
425a7(yum): cang ma thathams cad mkhyen pa'ing ma gnyigs par can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par
425a8(yum): par mngon par shes pa rnams min ga ces bya bar ma mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pathams ca
425b1(yum): btsa pa gags par nathos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas myur yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa la/ yang de la mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya nga/
425b2(yum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
425b3(yum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
425b4(yum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'grugyu
425b5(yum): pa'o/ gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sgra ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
425b6(yum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams spong zhes
425b7(yum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
425b8(yum): 'am ras rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang la mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
426a1(yum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'amar sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
426a2(yum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa tha
426a3(yum): cang bakhyen pa cid ma gtogs par nan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang del mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba sa
426a4(yum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
426a5(yum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
426a6(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am ring sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnam bsgom
426a7(yum): ba'i phyir mi ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stong cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ma gtogs par nathos kyis 'am rang sa
426a8(yum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang ri la ting nge 'dzin rnams minag ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
426b1(yum): rnal ba thams cad mkhyen pa cing ma gtogs par can thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang ro la ting nge 'jim rnams snga
426b2(yum): bsngal zhes bya bar ri mi dmigs pa'i phyir tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'ingam gzhogs par 'a rnam
426b3(yum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
426b4(yum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
426b5(yum): pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad pa/
426b6(yum): panyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la nying nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
426b7(yum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs/
426b8(yum): su sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
427a1(yum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhing ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sngo yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
427a2(yum): gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad

427a5(yum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tsha de rnams dpas zhes bya bar byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dpe
427a6(yum): mapa ma pa sa sa 'ab ngas rgyas kyis yongs su gyur mi 'jum
427a7(yum): nga 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'i tshur mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams ca rnam hA rnams cad mkhyen pa
427a8(yum): sa kyis pas 'a la mas byas mamam sa bya
427b1(yum): ma ma pa mas cas kya pargya sngal
427b2(yum): sasal pa 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sngams sdug pa phrul zhes bya ba de ma mags pa'i tshul gyis chos gan g+sa dge
427b3(yum): kya rnam pa rnams cad mkhyer pa nyid ma gtogs parnyan gyis kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sangs su sdang mi 'dus sdong mi 'gruba'o// ga
427b4(yum): gzungs kyis rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa'i thams cad kyang rnam pa 'ams ca sa n+ta
427b5(yum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs

427b8(yum): kyang rnam pathams cam ma khyen pa tshad ma gzigs par can byas kyi slar mengs/ su sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgom rnams mtshanam
428a1(yum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma

428b1(yum): na mas pa rgyas 'a ra mas rgya ma sa ma la ma lan /

430b1(yum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la ma 'jigs pa rnams mngon par 'du bya bya med ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos gan ci dag pa bams/

431a4(yum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
431a5(yum): rgyas kyi sar so yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos snyam
431a6(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ning ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'dus pa/
431a7(yum): gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
431a8(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing ma gtags pa nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang del ma
431b1(yum): mang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa bathams cad kyang rnam pa thams
431b2(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig
431b3(yum): pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
431b4(yum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig
431b5(yum): pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
431b6(yum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa'i/
431b7(yum): pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams nad kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par ldan/
431b8(yum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
433a1(yum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams minag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos snyan cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams/
433a2(yum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'ang ma gtogs par nyanas kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sang yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnams
433a3(yum): sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pacan
433a4(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'a
433a5(yum): pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sngon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying ma pa
433a6(yum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi mchos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya bar ngem
433a7(yum): rnamams pa'i tshul gyis kyis ston / dge ba ba mas kyang rnam sa na ma bya ba nyid ma gtogs pa mas kyis phe ma
433a8(yum): ma ma ma gas kyi mas ma ma
433b1(yum): ge ba'i rnams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen gnyipa matogs pa can thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sa sur mi 'jug pa'o// gang nges
433b2(yum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma meb ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cong/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
433b3(yum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
433b4(yum): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
433b5(yum): thos kyi 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar
433b6(yum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
433b7(yum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
433b8(yum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su stor mi 'jug
434a1(yum): pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams ca
434a2(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhid ma gtogs par ca thos kyis 'barang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sngor mo 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas rnam pa thams cad
434a3(yum): mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa tshang ma gtogs par nyan
434a4(yum): zos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
434a5(yum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mo 'jug pa'o// shes rab kyi pha //
434a6(yum): byin pa gang zag pa m+b+ha ba sam pa/ bam po bzhiHrdzun pa/ rab byor 'din byang chub sems dpa' sems
434a7(yum): dpa' dzin pa'i dge ba'i gshegs gnyis gnyen dugs par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
434a8(yum): chen pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsar pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi grang smras par mi 'gyur// rab 'byor gyis phasal pa/ bcom ldan 'am/
434b1(yum): lngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mogs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa bstan pa 'dos na/ 'jigs
434b2(yum): snang ba dang / skrag par 'gyur zhing / thabs mi mkhas te/ sdig pa'i grogs pa'o lag tu ltung zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags/
434b3(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rgyu/
434b4(yum): rnam pa thams cad babyed pa nyid dang ldan 'dis yid la bya ba med par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs so/ shes rab kyi pha rol
434b5(yum): phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
434b6(yum): ning dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa /
434b7(yum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
434b8(yum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs pa'i te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems
435a1(yum): su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs/
435a2(yum): chulha myi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba med par/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
435a3(yum): bsgom zhing dmigs te/ smyon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de ltar bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
435a4(yum): la byin pa la sto pa'i thakhas semakhas par ma par bya'o// rab 'byor gzha yang byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po dashes rab
435a5(yum): rol tu phyin pa la skrong pa'otshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs nad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
435a6(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byud do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
435a7(yum): rnam pa rnams cad mthun pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yangal bya ba ma par/ gzugs kyi song ba zhes bye bar med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
435a8(yum): spang pa nyid kyis kyang chom semams byed do// dgas rab kyi pha ma phyin pa la spong ba'ong/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pazhing dang ldan pa'i mang la bya
435b1(yum): med par gzugs phyi nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong panyid kyis kya
435b2(yum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
435b3(yum): gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i thal gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
435b4(yum): rlom sems su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa'i gzug

435b6(yum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs don dam pa

435b8(yum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs 'dus byas stong pa

438b3(yum): spong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// ye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

439a1(yum): spyod stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la

439b1(yum): su byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ming la bya ba med par tshor ba dzas dang cu
439b2(yum): nyid zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngag nyid stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa'i dkyang rlom sems su byed do// gas
439b3(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dngos po meng ba'i ngo ba

448a5(yum): ba med par/ mig rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid/
448a6(yum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la b+ha ba meng par
448a7(yum): mig mi dmigs pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sa/
448a8(yum): sa byed pa/ ses rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la myong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba med par/ mig dngas pa med pa sa/
448b1(yum): mas pa'i rgyal gyis dngas pa ma mangs byu ma sa nas

448b3(yum): ba'i tshul gyi so ba nyi srung ma nyid kyang dmigs la/ blang ba nyid myed gyis kya rlom sems su byung // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong pa'i tshe
448b4(yum): brnams cad bakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ming la bya ba med par/ mig dang po med pa'i jig cing stong pa zhes bya bar ying la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul sbyin ma
448b5(yum): po mang pa job nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
448b6(yum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pa nyid kyang dmigs
448b7(yum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
448b8(yum): meng par/ rnab kyi skyong stong pa zhes bya bar yong la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi mang banyid kyang dmigs la/ spong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/
448b9(yum): bya ba med par/ rna ba nas stong pa yid la

470a2(yum): pa'i ngobo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ming la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ spong pa nyid kyis kyangs rlom sems su

497a7(yum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus de rig pa dngos pa
497a8(yum): 'a ba'id steng shes bya ba 'das byed // dmigs pa'i tshum gyis dngos pa meng pa'i nga ba nyid gang ba nyid kyang dmigs pa 'ang banyid kyis kyi tha sa se su da/
497b1(yum): zhes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa sang phrag brgyub// dum bum pa/ bam po thabacu bya// rab 'byor gnad yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pa
497b2(yum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus de reg pa'i rkyed gyis tshor ba dang song ba zhes
497b3(yum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
497b4(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
497b5(yum): gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nga
497b6(yum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi rang stong pa nyid dmigasapa
497b7(yum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
497b8(yum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid

498a2(yum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
498a3(yum): kyang rlob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te
498a4(yum): rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem
498a5(yum): su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
498a6(yum): nga'adus byas stong pa'i zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

498a8(yum): mabyas stong ba zhes bye bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas snying pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes

498b2(yum): 'das pa stong po zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' les 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu bye
498b3(yum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma

499a2(yum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

503b9(yum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
504a1(yum): phra bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ lung brgyad kyis rlom sems su byed du
504a2(yum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med papo/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
504a3(yum): tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
504a4(yum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la spyad pa'i/

504a6(yum): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmi gas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
504a7(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
504a8(yum): gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cadam

504b2(yum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad man

505a2(yum): de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

505a4(yum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
505a5(yum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidi dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i khams rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das
505a6(yum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong po nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/

510b1(yum): de shes rab kyi ral tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis
510b2(yum): kha chos stong thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
510b3(yum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
510b4(yum): rkyen kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yi de la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
510b5(yum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te
510b6(yum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
510b7(yum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi
510b8(yum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
511a1(yum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
511a2(yum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngobo
511a3(yum): nyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
511a4(yum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i byin gyis tshor ba dngos pa med pa'i ji ba cang stong pa zhes bya bar ying la byed
511a5(yum): de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmi gos la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
511a6(yum): gcig zhus lags
